Today on #WorldHealthDay, Doctors are blocking HM Treasury to call on the government to stop financing fossil fuels, in the name of public health. 

Our leading medical institutions have also called for the government to "End subsidies for oil and gas extraction and redirect funds to green industry." 

Letter here: https://bit.ly/3JbKESG

It is vital for human health around the world that we get off fossil fuels as soon as possible in a just & fair transition for everyone. Failure to reach 1.5C would mean a 'catastrophic harm to health that will be impossible to reverse' -so said the @NEJM @BMJ @Lancet

The UK is giving millions of pounds of public money to Oil majors like Shell and BP through tax incentives. This means the UK takes barely $2/barrel in tax compared to Norway which takes over $20/barrel.

Taking that money back, from Oil and Gas companies record profits, we could power up our clean energy supply, fund an insulation drive, and support the poorest people through the energy crisis. 

“Climate activists are sometimes depicted as dangerous radicals,but the truly dangerous radicals are the countries that are increasing the production of fossil fuels. Investing in new fossil fuel infrastructure is moral & economic madness”- Antonio Guterres, UN Secretary General

Title: NA
Description:
Ha llegado el día. La comunidad científica ha pasado a la acción. 

Con sangre falsa y biodegradable, más de un centenar de investigadores y científicas españoles han realizado una acción de desobediencia civil noviolenta ante el Congreso de diputados.

Científicos de renombre como Fernando Valladares (CSIC) y Jorge Riechmann (UAM) se han expuesto a ser arrestadas para alertar al resto de la sociedad sobre la catástrofe climática que amenaza la humanidad entera.

Este evento se engloba en la semana de acciones en más de 25 países del movimiento internacional de científicos contra la crisis climática Rebelión Científica / @scientistrebellion.

La comunidad científica lleva décadas alertando y nada ha cambiado. Por ello, se ha visto obligada a pasar a la desobediencia civil noviolenta. Toca actuar acorde con lo que dice la ciencia. ¡Esto es una emergencia!

Fotos de @_a.astudillo__ y @mingo_graphics 

Post Credit: @esxrebellion

Title: NA
Description:
BREAKING: Scientists and Academics throw fake oil over Shell HQ

This morning, scientists calling for radical change in the face of the climate and ecological crisis took nonviolent direct action at the London headquarters of Shell, as part of the world’s largest ever scientist-led civil disobedience campaign. The group used modified fire extinguishers to spray biodegradable fake oil on the building, as well as posting relevant scientific papers to the walls.

The action comes two days after the latest IPCC report is released, with Jim Skea, a professor at Imperial College London and co-chair of the working group behind the report, stating that it is “now or never, if we want to limit global warming to 1.5C.”

Full report here: https://extinctionrebellion.uk/2022/04/06/breaking-scientists-and-academics-throw-fake-oil-over-shell-hq/

@shellmustfall @shell_knew

Title: NA
Description:
Today @xrbelgium rebels have set up a blockade to restrict access to the site of one of the most polluting companies in the port of Ghent, such as @arcelormittalbelgium @storaensoworld and @totalenergies_be.

The emissions of these companies in the harbor is 8 (!) times that of the city itself. 

Despite this, they are not bound by the City of Ghent to an ambitious climate or energy plan. Only a few of them make a meagre effort to reach climate neutrality, whilst contributing to climate change by lobbying against regulations and greenwashing their activities. They do this with billions worth of subsidies (e.g. in the form of ‘free emission rights'), leading to gigantic profit taking which benefits their shareholders. These handouts to the rich continue at the cost of the taxpayer, and in the meantime CO2-emissions only keep rising.

Current policies are unjust and deadly, threatening the future of humankind. It is high time to develop a genuinely ambitious climate plan for the port of Ghent and heavy industry and implement it as quickly as possible! The responsibility for developing and implementing this plan rests with the City of Ghent’s municipal government, North Sea Port and other stakeholders, with wide-ranging involvement of the citizens of Ghent.

 We therefore demand to:

❗️TELL PEOPLE THE TRUTH: about the enormous emissions of the port, and that we need to stop burning coal, oil and gas as fast as possible to lessen the damage due to climate change. 
❗️ACT NOW: ban fossil fuels in the port as quickly as possible, and become energy neutral.
❗️ACT FAIRLY: all citizens and companies shoulder the burden.
❗️ACT DEMOCRATICALLY: set up Citizen’s Assemblees of ordinary citizens of Ghent and involve them in developing environmental policies.

We perform this act of civil disobedience today because the urgency of the climate crisis demands it. The clock is ticking, and climate chaos, which already causes death on a massive scale, is only set to increase. Inaction is criminal! 💪 @xr_gent

Post Credit: @xrbelgium

Title: NA
Description:
World Water Rebellion and Global Climate Strike Makassar 2022

Lawan privatisasi air! Air milik bersama.

Air merupakan kebutuhan yang fundamental dan bagian tak terpisahkan dari kehidupan semua makhluk hidup. Resolusi 64/292 Majelis Umm PBB secara tegas menyebutkan bahwa hak atas air dan sanitasi yang bersih adalah bagian dari Hak Asasi Manusia dan
merupakan salah satu komponen terpenting bagi keberlanjutan hidup serta hak hidup.

Resolusi 64/292 Majlis Umm PBB secara eksplisit juga menyebutkan bahwa negara mesti secara progresif merealisasikan kewajiban hak asasi manusia terkait dengan akses terhadap air bersih dan sanitasi dengan segala instrumen kelembagaan dan kebijakan yang negara miliki. Kewajiban ini meliputi pemenuhan hak, penyediaan layanan, pemberian akses termasuk pemulihan yang efektif terhadap pelanggaran hak atas air pada warga negara.

Hanya saja, semakin menguatnya paradigma neoliberal dalam kebijakan negara yang bertumpu pada pembesaran kapital dan penguatan peran sektor privat yang dimediasi oleh pasar dalam penyediaan layanan barang publik dan hak-hak dasar, termasuk air, dalam praktiknya membuat hak dan akses warganegara atas air yang bersih dan sehat menjadi semakin terabaikan. Kebijakan neoliberal ini utamanya ditunjukkan oleh semakin meluasnya praktik privatisasi air serta kelalaian negara untuk memastikan bahwa tingkat pokok minimum hak atas air telah dinikmati oleh setiap warganegara. Kondisi ini berakibat pada semakin memburuknya persoalan akses dan hak atas air, utamanya bagi kelompok- kelompok sosial yang marjinal.

air adalah sumber kehidupan, sehingga pemerintah wajib menempatkan air bukan sebagai objek yang dikenai harga secara ekonomi. Air merupakan bagian dari hak asasi sehingga keadaan ekonomi seseorang tidak boleh menghalangi mereka untuk mendapatkan air.

Selain it dampak serius perubahan iklim mengancam ketersediaan air bersih di Indonesia. Perubahan pola curah hujan, kenaikan suhu, kenaikan muka air, dan kejadian iklim ekstrem akan menyebabkan krisis air bersih apabila perubahan iklim tidak ditangani secara serius.

Title: NA
Description:
THIS IS BLEAKEST WARNING YET

The latest United Nations’ IPCC report says that many of the impacts of global warming are now simply irreversible, and humans and nature are being pushed beyond their abilities to adapt. Deeper and faster cuts to greenhouse gas emissions are the only way to limit catastrophic warming.

We need to transform. Life on Earth is in crisis. Our climate is changing faster than scientists predicted and the stakes are high. Biodiversity loss. Crop failure. Social and ecological collapse. Mass extinction. We are running out of time, and our governments have failed to act.

We need to act now. Join us at rebellion.global/groups

Title: NA
Description:
💀 NO NEW FOSSIL FUELS 💀

Action at the Citigroup headquarters as employees walked into work on the morning of the bank’s Investor Day. Citi is the second largest funder of fossil fuel companies among all global banks and the largest US funder of coal, the dirtiest and most destructive source of energy on the planet. 

The latest United Nations’ IPCC report says that many of the impacts of global warming are now simply irreversible, and humans and nature are being pushed beyond their abilities to adapt. Deeper and faster cuts to greenhouse gas emissions are the only way to limit catastrophic warming. 

Although Citi has demonstrated that it is willing to go further than any other US bank by releasing a net zero pathway with absolute emission reduction targets, the plan does not entail how Citi will step away from the actual cause of climate chaos: fossil fuels.

Citi needs to commit to ending fossil fuel expansion and setting concrete, time bound targets now. 

Join us for the Spring Rebellion in April. See link in bio to sign up.

#StopTheHarm #ChangeIsNow #NoNewFossilFuels #ActNow #TellTheTruth #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateCrisis #ClimateEmergency #XRNYC #DeclareCEENow

Title: NA
Description:
"Raus aus der mörderischen Energie!"
#StandWithUkraine

Heute Früh haben Aktivist*innen in Wien an 3 Stellen gegen den Import von Öl & Gas aus Russland protestiert:
Am Wiener Schwarzenbergplatz (wo die neue Zentrale des russ. Ölkonzerns @lukoil_austria entsteht), am Ring an der Wiener Staatsoper (Sponsor ist @omv) und am Naschmarkt.

Ihr Statement: "Die Abhängigkeit von fossiler Energie (Kohle, Öl & Gas) ist eine existenzielle Bedrohung für Frieden und Klima."

Dabei schließen sie sich dem Aufruf von @rebellionua (Extinction Rebellion Ukraine) an, die in einem offenen Brief zum Widerstand gegen "fossile-fueled terror" aufrufen.

Sie erklären in ihrem Statement: "Wir können nicht zulassen, dass die Profite österreichischer Banken und Konzerne über das Recht der ukrainischen Bevölkerung gestellt werden, in einem freien und demokratischen Land selbstbestimmt zu leben."

“Putin glaubt, er könne uns erpressen," so eine Demonstrantin. "Er glaubt, wir Menschen im Westen seien zu bequem und zu verweichlicht, um ohne sein Blut-Öl und Blut-Gas auszukommen. Aber da irrt er sich gewaltig. Zeigen wir Putin, dass auch wir mit Einschränkungen leben können. Dass wir mit weniger Öl und Gas auskommen können, und dass wir dazu alle unseren Beitrag leisten. Geben wir Grundbedürfnissen den Vorrang – Wärme für alle statt Luxus für wenige!”

Title: NA
Description:
STOP GAZPROM / KOM VRIJDAG DEMONSTREREN

Voor de tweede keer op de stoep bij Gazprom én wij blijven terugkomen totdat de Nederlandse overheid stopt met het afnemen van Russisch gas en olie! Om deze oproep kracht bij te zetten, lieten we een cadeautje achter voor Gazprom: briefjes van bezorgde burgers met een boodschap aan Gazprom. Ook roepen wij gemeentes, bedrijven en instellingen die zaken doen met Gazprom op om hiermee te stoppen.
Door onze afhankelijkheid van fossiele brandstoffen dragen we niet alleen bij aan de klimaat- en ecologische crisis, maar ook aan gewapende conflicten zoals bijvoorbeeld die in de Oekraïne, Yemen, Syrië en Irak. Vandaag stonden we één minuut stil bij deze conflicten, de oorlog en alle slachtoffers hiervan.
Kom demonstreren tegen deze afhankelijkheid en laat je solidariteit voor Oekraïne zien! Aanstaande vrijdag komen we weer terug om de druk op te voeren. Kom dus op 4 maart om 18 uur naar het kantoor van Gazprom, Museumplein 9 te Amsterdam.

Title: NA
Description:
🌱LAND IS POWER 🌱 - with the IPCC report out today, we bring a vision and invitation to solidarity in the movement

🔥Simulatenous action in Ngorongoro, London, Edinburgh and Sheffield🔥

Slides 1-4- Yesterday the Maasai communities in resistance against the evictions of 167’000 Maasai driven by tourism greed blocked the entrance to the Ngorongoro Conservation Area

Slides 5-7 - Youth in London were joined by Samba Band and passers by in calling the Tanzanian High Commission to take a stance against the evictions, playing videos by the community and then visited Kuoni and Trailfinders to speak out against violations of human rights and Indigenous peoples rights 

Slides 8-9 - Youth in Edinburgh @ediyouthinresistance visit @kuonitravel and @trailfindersuk to relay to the agencies that they can support Maasai rights to their ancestral lands!

Slide 10 - @xryouthsheffield and @xrshef join digitally and stand in solidarity

🌱

WHAT WE LEARNED: the global family is united in the fight against oppression and the criminality of violence. Solidarity is an act of recognition of this truth. What is happening to the Maasai right now is happening to countless of communities across the world, all to the benefit of the few at the expense of the many. 

Only true people’s power will create justice in our name- that is what our generation is called to achieve. 

Will we rise or will we be complicit?

🌱

WANNA BE INVOLVED? Continue to take action to support the Maasai resistance! 

🕰 do you have 3 SECONDS to spare? Sign the boycott declaration in our bio!

💸 do you have RICH aunts/uncles? Send them the fundraiser in our bio! 

✍️ are you a WRITER? Get in touch with us to write a story about the Maasai resistance and pitch it to your student newspaper/blog!

🌱

⁉️We leave an open question: how can we link these struggles more tightly? How can we move beyond protesting and into finding solutions? 

Watch this space- we will continue to work out a few answers, and we invite you to get involved 🔥❤️🔥

#DecoloniseConservation #BoycottColonialTourism #HandsOffMaasaiLand #DecoloniseConservation #PanAfrikanLivingCulturesAlliance #Maasai #Tanzania #Ngorongoro #Loliondo #Serengeti

Title: NA
Description:
JOIN THE WOMEN’S MARCH | LINK IN BIO 

The Disproportionate Impact Climate Change Has On Women’s Health.

From supercharging extreme weather events to boosting the spread of infectious diseases, climate change is already having a huge impact on human health across the world.
But this impact is not being felt equally. A growing body of research suggests that the world’s most disadvantaged people are also the most vulnerable to the health impacts of climate change and the least likely to be able to adapt.
Gender is just one of many factors that can influence a person’s standing in society. This in-depth explainer looks into how climate change can have differing impacts on the health of men and women around the world.
An analysis of 130 peer-reviewed studies finds that women and girls often face disproportionately high health risks from the impacts of climate change when compared to men and boys.

The analysis shows that 68 per cent (89) of the 130 studies found that women were more affected by health impacts associated with climate change than men.

Title: NA
Description:
SYNGENTA = ECOCIDE

Le Vivant se rebelle à Seneffe ! 🐝🔥📢
Hier, des rebelles d’Extinction Rebellion Charleroi ont pris possession du canal Charleroi-Bruxelles pour dénoncer les crimes d’écocide dont Syngenta se rend coupable en exportant massivement des pesticides interdits en Europe 🇪🇺

☠️ Leur toxicité n’est plus à démontrer. Syngenta, la Belgique et l’Europe font chaque jour des victimes de ce commerce au-delà de leurs frontières.

La Belgique est un des principaux exportateurs de néonicotinoïdes, des pesticides tueurs de biodiversité, via le port d’Anvers. C’est à Seneffe, sur notre territoire, que se trouve la plus grosse usine européenne du groupe Syngenta, le géant suisse de la semence et de l’agrochimie et principal exportateur de ces néonicotinoïdes.

➡️ Pour en savoir plus sur les ravages causés par le commerce des produits interdits, visionnez cette courte vidéo du Corporate Europe Observatory : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ig4rpXDa4Y

Agissons maintenant ! 💚
Rejoignez la Rébellion, partagez ce post !

Giunge al termine un’altra giornata ricca di azioni, musica e partecipazione attiva alla vita democratica di questa città. 

Anche oggi, dopo tre mesi di azioni continuative, Extinction Rebellion - sulle note de @lamurgatorino -, ha invaso le strade e i ponti del centro città, per rimettere al centro lo stato di emergenza ecoclimatica che l’umanità sta vivendo. 

Domani, il Piemonte, avrà il suo Consiglio Regionale aperto sullo stato di emergenza ecoclimatica e sulle azioni necessarie per poterla affrontare. Questo consiglio è il frutto di mesi di presidi, blocchi stradali e scioperi della fame, e sarà finalmente un consiglio aperto alla comunità scientifica e alla società civile. 

➤ Ognuna di queste persone ha rischiato multe e denunce per rendere possibile il cambiamento necessario.

Description:
RECOVER NEVER, EXTINCTION FOREVER

G20 (Group of 20). An intergovernmental forum of 19 nations + EU, representing 60% of worlds population and 80% of the worlds GDP, also 80% of the worlds emissions.

Over the years, the G20 have a single focus: (GDP-based) economic growth. And this has translated to aggressive investment in extractive industries around the world, ranging from oil, gas, coal, mining, plantation, infrastructure, weaponry, petrochemicals and other destructive practices that systemically rapes earth, robs land from indigenous communities and causes the climate crisis.

The worst part? Doing all this while acting like they are world "leaders" that will save us from the climate crisis, offering fake greenwashing solutions using our money, all the while continuing the destructive practices supported by taxpayers money.

Enough is enough. We cannot expect the people that cause climate crisis to come out with policies needed to get out of it.

Speak up. Join the movement. Act now. We need that system change ASAP

@ExtinctionRebellionSydney’s Rainbow Rebellion marched on Warrang (Sydney) with rally organisers Community Action for Rainbow Rights and a host of allies to oppose the federal government’s hate aimed at trans young people: the Religious Discrimination Bill. ⁣
⁣
We reminded the politicians supporting this bill, both Liberal and Labor, that it's not okay to allow discrimination against LGBTQIA+ people!⁣
⁣
Rainbow Rebellion recognises marginalised communities, like the LGBTQIA+ and First Nations, are hit first and worst in crises because of existing inequality. The climate and ecological crisis is no exception!⁣
⁣
We invite everyone to join in solidarity with us, because we’re only free and safe when we’re all free and safe! ⁣
⁣

Title: NA
Description:
The weather is bad and it isn’t going to get better🌧

It will be easy to forget this weekend when the sun comes out and the wind dies down, but every year Eunice and Franklin will be coming back with their uglier friends. 

This is why, in between these storms, we have demanded the city #RED010. We have over-drafted the environment and it is essential that we begin to pay into this debt with climate neutral policies by 2025. 

In March we will be electing the final city council that can make meaningful policies to save the climate from a worsening catastrophe. Take Eunice and Franklin as a
warning of what is to come - it is time to #RED010!
We are grateful to all of our rebels, fellow activists, and political agents that joined us over the weekend outside city hall demanding change. We showed off our rebel style in a anti-fashion show, marched through the city chanting our demands, and hosted a protest festival. Saving Rotterdam is not only about adjusting policy from the top down, but creating a climate focused culture from the
bottom up.

With this in mind, we brought Rotterdammers in from the streets. It is our demand that we Let Citizens Decide on climate policies, throwing out career politicians looking for an oil dredged euro and lobbyist, the 1st world word for "corruption". Our citizens' assembly demonstrated the real sentiment of Rotterdam: Climate Neutral Housing NOW! Big thanks to @tramhaus.rtm for the anthems
and dancing!

(Posted @withregram • @xr.rotterdam)

📸✨: amongst others @pietervandijen_photography and @adrian.krac 

#Red010 #xr010 #extinctionrebellion #xr #climatecrisis #klimaatcrisis #rotterdam #townhallrotterdam #storm #climatactivism #klimaatactivisme

Title: NA
Description:
When it comes to greenhouse gas emissions, we often talk about the top 1%, but what about the top 0.01%?

We might be shocked to discover that when looking at income and emissions on a global scale, many of us living in the Global North are actually some of the wealthiest in the world—but there's still a huge disparity between the relatively wealthy and the super-rich. The top 1% of earners globally emit an average of 121 tons of greenhouse gases a year while the top 0.01% emit 2,700 tons over the same period.

The more money someone has, the more likely they are to consume and emit greenhouse gases. Owning multiple cars, avoiding public transport, flying several times a year—sometimes on private jets or even rocket ships—all contribute to the rich's out-of-this-world emissions.

While we should all be mindful of how we consume, we also need to hold society's most-polluting accountable and put pressure on policymakers to limit emissions.

Read more about the 0.01% in The Frontline by climate director @yessfun at @atmos link in bio! 

Post adapted and inspired from @atmos 
Follow them for incredible content on climate change, action and justice. 

Caption @atmos 
Sources @atmos @oxfaminternational

Title: NA
Description:
💥 KTB TRAINING: "ENHANCED LOBBYING TACTICS" 💥

📆 4 sessions total on Weds & Fris, 2nd & 18th of both Feb & March, 7PM GMT

🥊 The next stage of fighting the Policing Bill (among others!) will involve targeting specific MP's to convince them not to dismantle what's left of democracy in the UK.

Want to learn empowering & impactful new tactics for lobbying MP's & Lords around the Policing Bill, the Nationality & Borders Bill, or any of the authoritarian legislation making its way through Parliament (Health + Care Act, Elections Bill, Official Secrets Act, Online Safety Bill, Judicial Review Bill, British Bill of Rights/Scrapping the Human Rights Act)?

These tactics still include traditional lobbying (securing meetings with MP's) and also non-traditional, "enhanced lobbying" methods of confronting MP's with carefully-formulated questions wherever they may be (on the street, out to dinner, etc). The latter methods involve recording the Parliamentarian on video to document their response and thank them (or otherwise ) on social media.

🎁 For: Anyone who isn't shy at the though of speaking directly to MP's (in some cases, whether they want us to be or not). This isn't about being shouty-activist-confrontational. The less intimidating we look/behave, the greater the likelihood we'll secure an actual conversation, even if they're not expecting it.

MP's in particular are, after all, public servants. Sometimes they forget this. It's up to us to remind them.

💥 Check out the excerpt from the Birddog Nation documentary https://buff.ly/3ofJRbQ to see how it's done!

💥 This is a practical training evening—

💡 1). Please bring an idea for something you'd like to lobby an MP about.

Title: NA
Description:
🖤 Watch the full video here 🖤

Follow and Support: @theoceanrebellion 

The Metals Company (@metals.co) is planning to use its UN International Seabed Authority (ISA) 'license' to explore the deep seabed, to find out if metals can be mined – but we all know this is just a greenwashing exercise to make sure they can mine the Clarion Clipperton Fracture Zone (CCFZ) in the Pacific Ocean in two years time.

This ISA license will allow them to mine an area one third the size of Belgium, stripping it of all life (they claim they will delicately remove the top surface – but if you look at the machines they use you'll soon see this is a lie). This CANNOT be allowed to happen.

There's a growing list of companies refusing to use deep sea mined metals; it's very long and increasing weekly. Recently BMW, Volkswagen, Volvo and Scania have been joined by Renault. You can see the full list here: https://www.defendthedeep.org

The Metals Company must stop their absurd plans NOW. 

It's time to tell the truth about how destructive deep sea mining will be, how totally  unnecessary it is and why it can never be (nor could ever be) part of our future - especially when we know the next generation of batteries won't need the minerals that The Metals Company intends to provide.

FIND OUT MORE: https://oceanrebellion.earth/news/the-deep-sea-says-no

Video by Sven Peetoom

JOIN OCEAN REBELLION

#DeepSeaMining
#KeepItInTheDeep
#DefendTheDeep
#DontLookDown
#OneOceanSummit
#AsTheSeaDiesWeDie

@theoceanrebellion

Title: NA
Description:
🌊STOP DEEP SEA MINING🌊

Yesterday, a pair of Rotterdam rebels joined @theoceanrebellion in a striking and startling action at the terribly large and ironically named ship the "Hidden Gem" in the Rotterdam harbor. This is a ship belonging to the Metals Company, a company that wants to go out mining the deep sea. We projected a series of messages on the hull of this monster ship.

Deep Sea Mining will cause irreparable damage to the ecosystem that is important to all marine life and all life on Earth. All life is connected to the ocean. 

Noise from is also a huge problem. Whales and other deep-diving animals rely on sound to hunt prey, sonic prospecting and drilling will prevent this happening, seriously disrupting delicate ecosystems.

(Caption continues in the comments)

@oceanrebellion @extinctionrebellion @extinctionrebellionnl @xrebellionuk

Title: NA
Description:
Burgers beslissen! Burgers beslissen? Wat betekent dat precies? 
XR Rotterdam eist van de Stad Rotterdam dat ze burgers actief laat meedenken over het oplossen van de klimaatcrisis. We vragen de gemeente om de nodige educatie te geven, zodat iedereen even goed geïnformeerd is, en dat er platform wordt geboden zodat iedereen gemakkelijk en op gelijke voet in discussie kan gaan. Zo kunnen we samen manieren ontdekken om klimaatneutraal te zijn tegen 2025. Helaas heeft de stad nog niet de nodige actie ondernomen, dus is het tijd dat wij laten zien welk stap meer dan welkom is! #burgerberaad 

Als onderdeel van onze #RED010 Stadhuis Actie zullen we ons eigen Burgerberaad houden. Een burgerberaad is een manier om democratie naar de straten van onze stad te brengen. We kunnen laten zien welke actie, in plaats van woorden, we verwachten, en zo beslissen we welke punten er op de agenda moeten komen bij de laatste gemeentelijke vergadering voor de verkiezingen in maart. Burgerberaden hebben in de geschiedenis al hun effectiviteit laten zien bij discussies over abortus, huwelijksgelijkheid, parlementaire regelgeving en strafprocessen. Op 19 februari nodigen we Rotterdammers uit in ons stadhuis-op-de-straat om in discussie te gaan over hoe we alle huizen in de stad op een eerlijke wijze klimaatneutraal maken. Wij hebben flink lopen roepen over de klimaatcrisis de laatste tijd; maar nu is het aan jou om je stem te laten horen en de gemeente te vertellen wat er gedaan moet worden. 

Photography from @savannahvdr amongst others

— english in comments! —

#climatecrisis #klimaatcrisis #xrrotterdam #climateactivism #activism #citizensassembly #democracy #streets #powertothepeople #red010 #xr010 #extinctionrebellion #xr

Title: NA
NA
Description:
“I'm a Brazilian biologist and I actually cannot believe what I'm seeing... 

Brazil is on fire! 

We are losing biodiversity, killing and displacing wild animals and producing smoke, a lot of smoke. Our forests are adding carbon to the atmosphere instead of absorbing it. 

And, year after year, the situation seems to get worse, and the burning season extends for a longer period.

About 30 years ago, we assumed that our water potential would last forever and today we are paying the bill for our lack of planning and our arrogance, experiencing a water crisis that has everything to do with deforestation, as forests regulate the water cycle.

If it is any consolation, it seems that the country suffers from a double personality: while forests are being wildly burned on the one hand, there are reforestation projects with encouraging results on the other.” 

- Marina Milos 

📖 Read Marina’s full blog post - link in bio. 

#XRBlog #BrazilIsOnFire #Amazon

Title: NA
Description:
ACTION LOOKBACK: FIRST DAY OF ACTION

New York City had its first taste of the international rebellion against extinction on the winter of 2019, as part of several coordinated nonviolent direct actions taken around the country to mark XR’s debut in the United States.

The NYC XR chapter met in Central Park for a joyous kick off, from there embarking on a unpermitted march down 5th Ave under the tune of an enthusiastic marching band, flanked by a growing number of NYPD officers. Die-ins and banners took over symbols of corporatism and consumption, arrests were made, and we wrote our name on the streets.

From the very beginning, hearts, minds and hands have stayed on message: We are on this together, and we might be going down but we will not go quietly.

IT’S DO OR DIE FOR THE PLANET EARTH

Posted @withregram • @xr_nyc

📷: @ministererik , @kenschles

Title: NA
Description:
SMELLS LIKE DEATH: Peru reports small new oil leak during clean-up of the prior spill. Dead seals, fish and birds have washed up on the shore covered in oil, while fishing activities in the area have been suspended, the government has said.

An estimated eight barrels of crude oil leaked off the country's central Pacific coast as part of the clean-up process following a bigger spill earlier this month. Spanish energy firm Repsol said a clear-up operation for a major oil spill on the coast near Peru's capital Lima would take until the end of February, in an environmental incident declared a 'catastrophe' by the government. Repsol said it had enlisted fishermen to help clear up the oil.

The government has said Repsol spilled some 6,000 barrels of oil into the ocean last week near its La Pampilla refinery, which the company has blamed on unusual waves triggered by a volcanic eruption in Tonga.

The company has declined to state the magnitude of the spill, saying it's still evaluating the impact.

Source: The weather network, Reuters. 

#oilspill #oilspillcleanup #peru #perulima

Title: NA
Description:
Lavouras perdidas, rebanhos sem pastos: o campo do sul da Bahia foi tomado pelas enchentes que ocorreram no estado há cerca de 30 dias.

Agricultores e criadores sofrem ainda os impactos e estima-se que mais de 40% dos municípios baianos foram afetados.

Dona Isa é uma das agricultoras que está enfrentando perdas. Ela e seu marido têm um pequeno sítio onde cultivam legumes e frutas e criam porcos e galinhas. A propriedade foi engolida pela água, que destruiu a plantação e quase provocou a morte de animais.

Por outro lado, há muita solidariedade na região, pois veterinários e biólogos estão ajudando a população e os animais.

Segundo dados da Defesa Civil do Estado divulgados na quarta (29/12), 24 pessoas morreram, 53,9 mil ficaram desalojadas e 629 mil foram afetadas de alguma forma pelas enchentes.

Apenas no dia de Natal, a cidade de Ilhéus, uma das localidades mais atingidas, registrou mais chuva (136mm) do que o acumulado durante o mês de dezembro inteiro em 2020 (118mm) e em 2018 (131mm). Os dados são do Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia (Inmet).

Temporais concentrados em poucas horas atingiram dezenas de cidades baianas, como Vitória da Conquista, a quase 5 horas de carro a oeste de Ilhéus. Em 25 de dezembro, o registro de chuvas atingiu a marca de 86,8mm, muito acima do registrado em dezembro passado inteiro (2,6mm).

A CRISE CLIMÁTICA É REAL!
.
.
.

Title: NA
Description:
가덕도 신공항 특별법을 규탄하고 기후불복종 재판을 선포한 멸종저항서울 x 멸종반란 공동 기자회견이 어제 진행되었습니다. <멸종반란한국> 유튜브에서 기자회견을 다시보실 수 있습니다!

기자회견문 전문 :
지난 해 3월 15일, 우리는 민주당사 입구에서 쇠사슬로 스스로를 묶고 "기후파괴당 민주당 가덕도 신공항 특별법 철회하라”는 현수막을 펼치는 행동을 벌였다. 그러나 부산시장 보궐 선거를 앞두고 입지선정을 포함한 필수적 절차조차 무시한 채 특별법을 강행통과했던 민주당이 ‘절차’를 지키라며 외면했고, "법대로 처리해달라"는 민주당의 요청에 따라 6명의 활동가는 사지가 들려 경찰에 연행되었다. 
그리고 작년 말 법원은 약식 재판에서 활동가 6명을 ‘피고인’으로 지칭하며 총 2,000만원의 벌금형을 내렸다. 우리는 이에 불복해 정식 재판을 청구한다. 그래서 가덕도 신공항 특별법을 주도적으로 통과시킨 민주당의 위선과 이에 항의한 우리의 행동과 요구가 정당했음을 재판정 안팎에서 주장할 것이다. 
우리는 우리의 행동 이후 더 악화되고 있는 가덕도 상황에 분노한다. 부산시는 신공항 건설을 넘어 가덕도 입구 생태의 보고인 눌차만까지 콘크리트로 채워 배후 신도시를 조성하겠다는 계획을 발표했다. ‘지역경제 살리기’라는 거짓말로 기업들에 이윤을 보장해주는 대가로 섬과 숲, 바다, 자연 생태계와 지역 공동체마저 무참하게 파괴하려고 한다. 이 와중에 가덕도는 외지인과 토건자본의 투기판이 되어버렸다. 
우리를 더 절망하게 만드는 것은 이것이 가덕도만의 문제가 아니라는 점이다. 정부와 여당, 지자체들은 가덕도 신공항 뿐만 아니라 새만금과 제주도 성산 등에 10여 개의 신공항을 지을 계획을 추진하고 있고 국내외 10여 곳에서 석탄발전소 건설을 강행하는 등 기후생태위기 대응에 역행하는 사업을 계속 벌이고 있다. 전국 곳곳에서는 지역 주민들의 반대에도 핵 폐기장과 고압 송전탑이 들어서고 있고, 재벌 기업의 가스 발전소 건설과 해외 자본을 끌어들인 대규모 해상 풍력 단지 등 기후정의와 에너지 민주주의에 역행하는 일들이 계속 벌어지고 있다.
그럼에도 기후생태위기와 불평등을 극복할 정책을 고민해야 할 대선 시기 주요 후보들은 우리의 기대와 정반대되는 길을 걷고 있다. 온실가스 배출 주범인 기업들에 대한 규제가 강화되어야 하는 때에 민주당 이재명 후보는 기업의 요구에 부응해 ‘기업하기 좋은 규제프리 국가’를 외치고 있고 국민의 힘 윤석열 후보는 탄소감축 목표 하향, 원전 신규 건설, 가덕도 신공항에 대한 예비타당성 조사를 면제와 같은 막말만 늘어놓고 있다. 심지어 기후대통령을 표방하는 정의당 심상정 후보까지 SK의 최태원 회장을 만나 SK의 그린워싱을 꼬집는 대신 그의 ESG 경영을 치켜 세우기까지 했다. 
이처럼 대부분의 정치세력과 기업들이 기후생태위기를 진지하게 대면하지 못하는 때에 시민들의 행동 선택지는 많지 않다. 무책임 권력자들에 저항하는 시민들의 불복종 행동이 확산되는 것은 너무 당연하다. 그렇기에 권력은 시민들의 저항을 연행과 벌금으로 막으려 하고 있다. 얼마전에는 해외 석탄발전소 건설을 하는 두산중공업 로고에 쉽게 지울 수 있는 녹색 수성 페인트를 칠했다는 이유로 두 명의 활동가에게 유죄 확정에 따라 500만원의 벌금형이 선고되기도 했다. 그러나 누가 진정 역사 앞에 ‘피고인’인가? 
우리는 행동에 앞서 발표한 성명서에서 정부가 “입으로는 탄소중립을 말하면서 탄소배출을 늘리는 개발주의 광풍을 불러일으키고 있다” 비판하고 정부와 여당의 “배신과 기후파괴 행위를 지켜만 보지 않을 것”임을 선언했다. 우리는 재판투쟁 과정을 통해 우리의 약속을 지키고자 한다.
다행히 우리는 혼자가 아니다. 기후행동에 참여하는 시민들은 늘고 있고 기후불복종 재판투쟁을 위한 모금 요청에 이틀만에 모금 계좌를 닫아야 할 정도로 많은 시민들이 지지를 보여주었다. 또한 가덕도 신공항 만이 아니라 새만금 신공항, 삼척의 포스코 석탄발전소, 홍천과 횡성의 송전탑, 청주와 합천 등에 지어질 민간 가스발전소 등에 저항하는 흐름도 커지고 있다. 권력을 가진 ‘그들’의 기후생태학살을 막을 방법은 ‘우리’의 힘을 키우는 것이다. 우리의 투쟁은 연결되어있고 기후정의를 위한 더 큰 물결을 만들 수 있음을 우리는 확신한다. 
이에 우리는 법원의 벌금 부과에 불복해 공식 재판을 청구한다. 기후생태위기의 시대에 기후정의를 위한 더 큰 연대를 위하여!

Posted @withregram • @xr_korea

Title: NA
Description:
🥁 VITTORIA A TORINO DOPO 8 GIORNI DI SCIOPERO DELLA FAME 

Proprio oggi Ruggero aveva iniziato il suo ottavo giorno di sciopero della fame che lo aveva portato già a perdere più di 5 kg. Ruggero e lə ribelli che lo hanno ogni giorno sostenuto erano ancora a piazza Castello quando è arrivata la notizia.

✒️ Per darvela riproponendo le parole scritte da @xrtorino :
"È con le lacrime agli occhi di Ruggero che abbiamo il piacere di annunciare che, dopo 8 giorni di sciopero della fame, la Regione Piemonte ha accettato la richiesta di convocazione di un consiglio regionale aperto sullo stato di emergenza ecoclimatica. 
Un consiglio aperto per coinvolgere tutte le forze politiche regionali, la comunità scientifica, la società civile e la cittadinanza in un discorso pubblico che non sia guidato da prese di posizione ideologiche. Portiamo in un consiglio regionale aperto ciò che la scienza ci dice con chiarezza che è necessario fare: azzerare le emissioni molto rapidamente e arrestare la devastazione degli ecosistemi e la perdita di biodiversità. Incominciando ora.
La vittoria di Ruggero è solo un piccolo pezzo di un puzzle enorme e terribilmente difficile da ricomporre. Ma è la vittoria di ognunə di noi e di chiunque sia stato al suo fianco in questi giorni difficili.
La vera battaglia inizia domani. 
Per questa ragione, invitiamo tutta la cittadinanza ad un presidio collettivo venerdì 28 gennaio, alle 15h30, sotto il Palazzo della Regione Piemonte. 
Per ripeterlo ancora una volta: la Regione Piemonte ha fallito."

✊ 🌊Sollevati. Ribellati. Sostieni chi mette il proprio corpo al centro della protesta. Sii parte del cambiamento.
Insieme possiamo vincere questa battaglia epocale.

#ExtinctionRebellion #RebelForLife #HungerStrikeForClimateJustice

Title: NA
Description:
🔥 ACTION AVIATION À L'AÉROPORT D'AFFAIRES DU BOURGET🔥

🗣Vendredi, des militant·e·s d’Extinction Rébellion, @alternatibaparis et @attac_fr ont investi le tarmac de Paris-Le Bourget, 1er aéroport d’aviation d’affaires en Europe.

🎯 Les objectifs ?
- Dénoncer la consommation indécente des ultra-riches, dont les voyages en jet privés ont augmenté de 31 % entre 2005 et 2019 🚀
- Exiger une plus grande participation des plus riches au financements de l’#UrgenceClimatique, écologique ET sociale via des mesures comme l’ISF climatique ou la lutte acharnée contre l’évasion fiscale 💸
- Marquer le début de la présidence française du conseil de l’Union Européenne 👋

✈️ Les vols en jets privés sont 10 à 20 fois plus polluants que les vols dits « commerciaux », et l’aéroport du Bourget est le plus fréquenté d’Europe pour l’aviation d’affaires. Mais on continue à culpabiliser les citoyens à « faire leur part » et à être « éco-responsables ». STOP ! 

❌ Dans le cadre de la présidence française de l’Union Européenne, Emmanuel Macron doit exiger que la taxation du kérosène s’applique aussi sur vols commerciaux que sur les jets privés. 
De nos gouvernants complices de l’inaction climatique, nous exigeons des mesures plus ambitieuses pour contenir les émissions de gaz à effet de serre françaises.

📣 Entendez notre message ! Il est temps ⏳
Rejoignez la rébellion ✊

Crédit 📸 : @le_duq_ et Arnaud Vilette

Happening on Twitter Spaces at bit.ly/ktbspace

Writer and Director David Schneider is hosting a talk on the #PolicingBill to listen to people who actually know what they’re talking about from 
@killthebill_official 
 
@extinctionrebellion 
 @united4blacklives 
@majestic_marvina 
@shutitdowntatiana 
So grateful to everyone's hard work to #KillTheBill in the Lords, but if we don't want to lose what we fought so hard to win, we can't slow down now.

8 PM Sunday, 23 Jan, we'll be having a conversation on Twitter with #SpacesHost @davidschneider & co-hosts from the Kill the Bill Official Coalition: @majesticmarvina of @united4blacklives & @blm_leeds & @shutitdowntatiana from @extinctionrebellion & @xrebellion.digital.

Special guests include Nick Anim from Jubilee for Climate & @africans_rising & musical artivist @jameskennedyuk to discuss next steps on the #PolicingBill & end the evening with James' pissed-off, primal protest anthem, "The Power". ✊🏽

If you haven't been on a Twitter Spaces before, a few tips:

-update the Twitter app to ensure access to spaces & reduce glitches

-turn captions on or off from the three-dot menu in top right

-show speakers what you're feeling by clicking on the heart icon & choosing a reaction to flash over your avi

So invite your friends & maybe even your Tory auntie so they can all join us and learn how to be badass activists like YOU!

Looking forward to seeing you there! Let's fight to Kill ALL these Bills!

Title: NA
Description:
Icelandic in comments //
On Saturday January 15th we held our first action of the year and of our plastics campaign, in Lækjartorg. We brought with us a box filled with plastic waste to highlight the Icelandic government's massive shortcomings in waste management.
The statistics released by the Icelandic Reycling Fund are far from real, since they present incinerated plastic as recycled plastic. Nevertheless, even recycling is far from effective, since less than 10% of plastic that has ever been produced, has been recycled. The remainder has been landfilled, burned or is polluting our waterways. 

We have three goals: We want the Icelandic government to assume responsibility and tell the truth about the massive shortcomings in waste management and to disambiguate the effectiveness of recycling. We want the government to stop funding corrupt liars who fail to deliver their promises. We want to hear how everyone wants to deal with this phenomenon, with plastic waste. 

FOLLOW AND SUPPORT @xr.reykjavik

Photographer: @nolfo_davide 

#extintionrebellion #tellthetruth #actnow #reykjavik #plasticsaction

Title: NA
Description:
PRITI SHITTY DEMOCRACY⁣
⁣
Today 800 Lords – of whom less than 10% are from ethnic minorities, around 25% aren't male and the majority are appointed by the Queen – will discuss and vote on the future of British Democracy.⁣
⁣
They will vote on an authoritarian bill that increases stop and search powers, targets the vulnerable, and increases punishments for peaceful protest. The bill is one that has been proposed and amended by the very same cabinet ministers who have lied and broken the laws of this land in front of our very eyes.⁣
⁣
Extinction Rebellion stand alongside the many groups and movements that are set to be effected, and stand for all of our right to protest and to challenge a government that are failing to protect us.⁣
⁣
Extinction Rebellion stand for increasing democracy and empowering people to play an active role in policy. Many have questioned the importance or value of Citizens' Assemblies, but today we can think of nothing else, as we watch and wait for a house of unrepresentative unelected public figures to decide on the fate of our democracy and the movements for change.⁣
⁣
#KillTheBill #RightToProtest #ActNow⁣
⁣
Share Now, Defend Democracy and the Right To Protest⁣
⁣
Show up, 5pm for A REALLY ANNOYING DEMO, House of Lords, College Green, London⁣
⁣
Step up, the crisis is happening now. It's time for nonviolent civil resistance.⁣
⁣
Find out more and get involved, links in bio⁣

Posted @withregram • @xrebellionuk

#ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateCrisis #CivilDisobedience #NoMoreEmptyPromises #SackPritiPatel #XR #Protest #BLM #EcologicalEmergency #BorisIsALiar #PritiFacist #ClimateCriminals #ExtinctionIsForever #TellTheTruth #Protest #ClimateJustice #SystemChange not #ClimateChange

Title: NA
Description:
CALLING ALL REBELS IN THE UK: KILL THE BILL

Want to act? Toolkit in link in bio! 
Follow and support @killthebill_official 

If you thought the Policing Bill was bad before, that was nothing compared to the latest version.

Priti Patel has quietly added further measures to effectively criminalise protest.

These laws belong in a dictatorship, not a democracy.

Some of the worst new powers 👇🏽

1) Police will be able to stop & search at protests to avoid a "public nuisance". If you refuse, you face jail time.

2) Attaching yourself to anything, carrying "equipment" for this, even potentially holding hands will be illegal.

3) Most terrifying of all: new Asbo-like orders can be imposed on protesters, even if no crime is committed. These remove rights to freedom of speech and assembly + can ban you from certain places, seeing certain people, carrying certain items, encouraging protest online.*

**(although another ammendments states that you have two protest related convictions you could be banned from using the Internet and communication apps) 🙄 ***

It was through protest that people won some of our most fundamental rights - the right to vote, for example.

No wonder Priti Patel wants to criminalise it.

We are sliding rapidly into an authoritarian society. We have to stop this Bill.

Title: NA
Description:
💣La exploración sísmica es una técnica utilizada por la industria fósil para encontrar petróleo en el fondo marino. Consiste en, literalmente, bombardeos que se realizan con cañones de aire, generando ruidos tan potentes como el despegue de un cohete espacial🚀 

🐋Naturalmente es una actividad muy dañina para los ecosistemas marinos, especialmente para la fauna que los habita. Los animales como la ballena, orcas, delfines, e incluso poblaciones de peces sufren desorientación, cambios en su comportamiento, estrés, discapacidad auditiva, lesiones masivas y hasta la muerte por ahogamiento o varamientos🐬 

🛢️Además, de realizarse luego la explotación petrolera mediante plataformas offshore, existe el riesgo de derrames☣️ 

❌Peor aún, este proyecto significa profundizar la matriz energética basada en combustibles fósiles que nos trajo al actual estado crítico de cambio climático. Las instituciones cientificas mas reconocidas nos dicen que tenemos que reducir de forma drastica las emisiones de carbono en estos próximos años para evitar los impactos más catastróficos de esta crisis. 

🔥Registros de nuestra ADNV frente a las puertas de Equinor por un mar libre de petroleras 

❤️‍🔥Con amor y furia

Title: NA
Description:
TO SUPPORT: Follow @xrvenezia and check out the ways you can help at their link in bio! 

The people of Venice is going to rise like its waters! 🌊

Hearing the call of the Rebellion, we started a mobilisation project in our beautiful city. Recurrent Heading for Extinction events and campaigns of colorful, daring, nonviolent actions bring the three XR demands to our local government. Going from neighborhood to neighborhood and building on the pre-existing social networks we plan to gather enough people to rebel disruptively for life in Venice this Spring! 

Although we are starting locally, we are also coordinating with other XR groups
in Italy to bring people from all cities to rebel in Rome in October 2022.

To reach our goal we need to cover logistic expenses, so we organised a
crowdfunding and are asking for your support. Your contribution will help
us print banners, flyers and posters, do arts, and help rebels to work full-time on the rebellion.

Link to donate in @xrvenezia LINK IN BIO

Title: NA
Description:
Calling all rebels in the UK: Let’s KILL THE BILL / A breakdown of the new policing bill in the UK. What are Boris Johnson and Priti Patel upto? 

Follow and support @killthebill_official / LINK IN BIO for toolkit and ways you can help

10th January - the Lords have begun voting on the draconian amendments added to the already authoritarian #PCSCBill.

Now is the time to add your voice by writing letters, holding vigils, posting on social media, ADDING PRESSURE to make sure the amendments are voted down!

Go to ktbofficial.org to access the writing tool. 

What can you actually do about the Police, Courts, Sentencing and Courts Bill? If you’ve read the recent press coverage about the #PolicingBill and want to do something, here is what would actually be useful. 
Action: Write to your MP before 17 Jan.

1. Your letter should start with something like “I am concerned about this Bill because Part 3 will allow almost any protest, gathering, or assembly of people in public to be severely restricted.”

Change the words to your personal tone.

2. Write about a protest or march you attended. It’s useful but not essential to mention how noisy (or not) it was, how busy (or not) it was, how much you knew, why you cared so much, what sorts of campaigning you had tried before that, and what change resulted from the protest.

3. Say that you are very concerned about the new Serious Disruption Prevention Orders (the protest banning orders) which have been reported in the press.

4. End your letter by asking your MP to pass your concerns to members of their party in the House of Lords, and/or to the Minister, Baroness Williams.

Conservatives are in a strong position to pass the letter on to the Minister — if they can be persuaded to do so.

Finally, just to say that when you write to your MP, please be kind. It may make you feel better to shout, but it’s likely to be counterproductive. Remember that MPs are human too!

#killthebill #killthebills

Title: NA
Description: Extinction Rebellion Zagreb (CRO) held a protest in front of the Ministry of Economy and "Sustainable Development" on 13th December 2021. Rebels raised their voice against the politicians' promise made at COP26 that the Plomin Coal Power Plant will be closed by 2033., which is not acceptable. One rebel climbed the entrance with a sign saying "No way out of the climate crisis with coal", two rebels blocked an entrance to the building where the Ministry is (private building with other companies inside, such as the WTO). A few rebels were standing out in the cold with a sign "Close Plomin by 2023, not 2033". Nobody from the Ministry came down to speak with us or give a statement. We were blocking for ~3h. One rebel was detained*. Local media coverege was ok, but still no reply from the Ministry 30h later. We will continue to pressure them!

Title: NA
Description:
Climate Anxiety can be our biggest obstacle, delaying and paralyzingly us into inaction. 

The answer lies in a “ruthless compassion” – for ourselves and others. Ruthless compassion can give rise to“radical hope”: a belief that meaningful action can make a difference, which is rooted in the reality of the crisis rather than a naive belief that it might not be as bad as we think. 

Together we're building a powerful movement that is participatory and inclusive. Together we're unstoppable.

#climatecrisis #climateanxiety

Credited all content to : @guardian / Jillian Ambrose / Caroline Hickman / Dr Renee Lertzman

Description:

It’s now or never to to act on the climate crisis. After a record breaking temperatures, dire warnings and devastating climate disasters- we are calling for all stakeholders to ACT NOW! 

The story of transformation amid the climate crisis begins with you. 

#WeNeedEveryone

We need you – whoever you are, however much time you have to offer. Together we're building a powerful movement that is participatory and inclusive. Together we're unstoppable.

Join us at rebellion.global/groups 

Happy disobedience and prosperous resistance. 

#climatecrisis #actnow #extinctionrebellion

🖼 : @luikwiatkowska 💚

Title: NA
Description:
#2021Recap NOWHERE IS SAFE

The climate crisis is NOT FAIR. We are all affected by it but never equally. The poorest, oft marginalized among us are hit the hardest and live the reality of the climate crisis every day. 

They are on the very frontlines of the fight against climate change. All this, although they’ve done the least to create the crisis we see today. 

These are the pictures of climate disasters that resonated the most with you across this year. 

Swipe through. We could never hope to fit every single bit in the myriad of destruction the climate crisis causes in people’s lives, but here are a few of the most iconic and defining pictures that came from those events. 

This new year, remember that Action is greater than Hope and Hope is greater than Fear. 

In this crisis, we are all we need. Together. Rooted in love. 

Join us at rebellion.global/groups

Title: NA
Description:
#2021recap 

Swipe through to see the actions you loved and resonated with the most this past year. 

As we head into a new year,  Let us take a moment to consider why we are here. Let’s recall our love for the whole of humanity, in all corners of the world. Let’s remember our love for this beautiful planet that feeds, nourishes and sustains all life. Let’s recollect our sincere desire to protect all this, for now and for generations to come. As we act today, may we find the courage to bring this sense of peace and appreciation to everyone we encounter, to every word we speak, and to every action we make. In this emergency. Together. Rooted in love. We are all we need.

Title: NA
Description:
Meat and dairy giants feed climate crisis by dragging their heels on methane
World’s biggest livestock corporations ‘given free pass by governments’ over lack of clear targets to reduce emissions.

🚨Livestock generate about 32% of anthropogenic, or human-generated, methane, mainly from the planet’s billion-plus cattle. It also accounts for 80-90% of the US’ total water consumption. 

The industrialisation of meat is a deeply colonial story. Industrial farming emerged only in the 1960s, in the US. 

Settler-colonialism and the colonizer’s establishment of corporate capitalism was — and is — the precursor of unethical farming methods. 

If we are to look forward, we need to relearn indigenous systems, systems that have been operating sustainably for millennia. 

Swipe through for more. 

Love & Rage 

Sources: @animal_rebellion @guardian and Juliana Yazbek

#climatechange #climatecrisis #dontlookup

Title: NA
Description:
TRUST THE PEOPLE⁣
⁣
When climate protesters risk their liberty to safeguard us all, they deserve thanks not criminal convictions⁣
⁣
Last week, a jury made up of ordinary people agreed⁣
⁣
The jury voted to acquit the six XR protesters who stopped a Docklands Light Railway train at Canary Wharf in April 2019. The six pleaded that their action was a lawful response to imminent climate breakdown and ecological collapse⁣
⁣
The rebels, all members of @christianclimateaction, admitted to their part in the action and its planning, but argued they were within their rights to protest. They reminded the court that the action had been planned to minimise the security risk to the public and themselves, but that attracting media attention is crucial to raise public awareness of the crisis⁣
⁣
#TellTheTruth #Jury #NotGuilty⁣
⁣
During the action on 25th April 2019, five of them climbed on top of the train and displayed banners that read Business As Usual = Death” and “Don’t Jail the Canaries” (in reference to three protesters who were at the time on remand for an earlier protest), while one, Dr Diana Warner, glued herself a train window⁣
⁣
This is one of the first protest cases in the UK to be heard in the crown court following the Supreme Court’s landmark ‘Ziegler’ ruling and could influence the prosecution of future cases. XR has a number of other crown court cases coming up next year that will also be heard before a jury⁣
⁣
Ordinary people understand the difference between "the law" & our moral duty to protect Earth. It’s time we all came together in the streets to demand the government #ActNow on the #ClimateEmergency and deliver #ClimateJustice ⁣
⁣
#ClimateEmergency #EcologicalEmergency #CivilDisobedience #Nonviolent #ExtinctionIsForever #TellTheTruth #CitizensAssemblies #EducateAgitateOrganise #COP26 #NetZero #ClimateCrisis #ClimateAction #ClimateJustice #SystemChange not #ClimateChange

Repost from @xrebellionuk

Piemonte, dicembre 2021: Gli eventi metereologici estremi si susseguono con sempre maggiore frequenza ed intensità. La qualità dell’aria continua ad essere una delle peggiori a livello europeo. 
Secondo le logiche di chi governa la Regione Piemonte, è accettabile morire sul posto di lavoro, è accettabile morire per l’inquinamento, è accettabile morire per un clima fuori controllo. 
 
Per questo motivo, martedì scorso, un gruppo di attivistə ha occupato l’ingresso del Consiglio regionale del Piemonte. 
Se la democrazia non alimenta e difende il bene comune, ribellarsi diventa necessario.

Title: NA
Description:
❓¿Sabías que la producción de ropa es más alta que nunca antes y que al mismo tiempo estas prendas son creadas para usarse por menos tiempo, además toda la cadena de producción de esta ropa de "descarte" es ultra contaminante? 

⚠️La gran responsabilidad de esto recae en la industria de la moda rápida y las políticas de los gobiernos del mundo que lo permiten. 

🧐ZARA parece haber entendido este problema, una de sus nuevas líneas de ropa llamada “Join Life” (unite a la vida🙄) está hecha con tejidos más sostenibles que sus otras prendas con algo que ellxs denominan “algodón cultivado ecológicamente", que se fabrica a partir de pulpa de madera (que se afirma que se obtiene de forma sostenible), o tejidos reciclados como el poliéster. 

😒A primera vista, parece un buen esfuerzo y esto es exactamente lo que esta corporación quiere que pensemos 

🤔Resulta que nadie sabe bien el origen y los metodos de producción de estos nuevos tejidos. 

🤷‍♂️¿Acaso esperan que les creamos así no más? 

🔥Necesitamos saber de dónde procede cada tipo de tejido, qué materiales y procesos se emplean en su producción, quién lo fabrica, en qué condiciones trabaja y cuánto se le paga por su trabajo. 

⚖️Sin justicia social en toda la cadena de suministro, estas prendas "eco-editadas" no pueden considerarse sostenibles sino un gran lavado verde. 

🛑La moda rápida es un peligro y tiene que ralentizarse: es necesario un cambio de paradigma. 

👗Los trajes utilizados en la acción son diseños de @trashcoutureok

Posted @withregram • @xrargentina

Title: NA
Description:
Het is alweer bijna kerst, maar toch moet ons nog iets van het hart over Zwarte Piet. Onze recente acties rond dit thema leverden, naast een heleboel steun, ook onbegrip op. In deze post zetten we daarom ons standpunt nog een keer uiteen en roepen je op te doneren voor de rechtszaak die @kozwartepiet, ook namens onze rebellen, aanspant vanwege de enorme geweldsexplosie in Volendam. En ook om de schade aan de bus te vergoeden (zie onder voor meer informatie over hoe te doneren.) 

Ondanks decennialange uitgesproken kritiek vanuit de Zwarte gemeenschap zijn velen van ons opgegroeid met een sinterklaasfeest, waarbij er geen moment aandacht was voor Zwarte Piet als racistisch figuur. Voor sommige mensen geldt, ook vandaag nog, dat zij moeilijk begrijpen wat Zwarte Piet te maken heeft met de klimaat- en ecologische crisis. 

De klimaat- en ecologische crisis zijn het gevolg van eeuwenlange roofzucht van, met name, Westerse landen. Wij hebben de aarde systematisch leeggeroofd. Fossiele brandstoffen, planten, dieren en mensen: we zien alles op aarde als een manier om onze rijkdom te vergroten. Deze roofzucht beperkt zich niet tot eigen grondgebied. Sterker nog, juist op andermans grondgebied hebben Westerse landen ongekend huisgehouden: kolonialisme. Helaas niet iets van het verre verleden. Dit gebeurt ook vandaag nog, officieel meestal niet meer door staten, maar door multinationals.

Kolonialisme bracht racisme met zich mee. Racisme en slavernij. Dat leidde, uiteindelijk, tot een Zwarte Piet die gebaseerd is op een stereotiepe karikatuur van een Zwart tot slaaf gemaakt persoon. Dat is waarom kolonialisme, racisme en klimaatontwrichting allemaal onderdeel zijn van hetzelfde verrotte systeem. Dat is waarom XR solidair is met KOZP in de strijd tegen anti-zwart racisme en een groep rebellen het VOC-schip bij het Scheepvaartmuseum in Amsterdam heeft bezet en aanwezig was bij de KOZP-demonstratie in Volendam.

Doneren voor de rechtszaak en de schade aan de bus kan online via o.a. iDeal, PayPal, credit card via de link in bio.

Of, om het zelf over te maken:
Naam: Nederland Wordt Beter
Rekeningnummer: NL09 TRIO 0197 9666 91 (Triodos Bank) 

@extinctionrebellionnl

Title: NA
Description:
We are the red rebels.

Red symbolizing the blood
that we share with all living beings.
The blood that unites us and makes us one.

We invite you to connect with the living planet, with all its inhabitants, with our ancestors and 
with the generations that follow us.

Mourn with us,
for the destruction, the injustice
and the great loss of all life.

Fight with us,
we fight in silence for what is dear to us.
We are non-violent in the midst of all violence.

Connect with us
with your sorrow, pain, fear...
but also with your love,
and also with your hope.

We, red rebels,
stand at the crossroads between 
art and activism.
Everywhere in the world where people
are fighting for life on earth,
we appear and we give
them courage, without words.

Action of @xr_gent and @extinctionrebellionantwerp

Title: NA
Description:
HOW TO DEAL WITH CLIMATE ANXIETY

Action > Hope > Fear
It has been a scary few weeks and climate anxiety is very real. If you feel overwhelmed and anxious about the climate problem, you are not alone.

When it comes to climate change, fear isn’t enough to motivate long-term, sustained action. It may spur a short-term response; but long-term, it will paralyze us.

What we actually need is efficacy – the understanding that if we act, we can make a difference in ourselves, in others, and in the world around us. And one of the best ways to build efficacy, in ourselves and others, is to look for examples of what other people like us are doing -- and share them --- and do them!

Find your local group of rebels here: rebellion.global/groups

caption @katherinehayhoe

#hopeandhealing #resilient #climatesolutions #climatechange #climatechangeisreal #savingus #scicomm #mentalhealth #climateaction #climatesolutions #globalpandemic

Title: NA
Description:
📣 LA SERBIA SI RIBELLA ALLA MAXI MINIERA DI LITIO 📣

Anche sabato scorso, per il terzo fine settimana consecutivo, migliaia di persone hanno occupato strade, ponti e piazze cittadine a #Belgrado e in molte città della #Serbia. 

✊ Lə manifestanti si battono contro il governo che ha aperto le porte alla multinazionale anglo-australiana #RioTinto, per l’estrazione di #litio in un maxi giacimento nella valle di #Jadar.
Nella valle, che verrebbe devastata e pesantemente inquinata dalle attività estrattive, c’è il più grande granaio del paese e ci sono due fiumi che forniscono acqua a milioni di persone.

🌱 Le proteste, in queste settimane, si sono anche allargate verso altre tematiche ambientali, come l’inquinamento dell’aria (il peggiore in Europa) che uccide migliaia di persone ogni anno.

🙅 La multinazionale ha un passato di corruzione, degrado ambientale e  violazione dei diritti umani, eppure ha già un accordo con il governo serbo per un investimento di 2,4 mld di dollari in quella che diventerebbe la più grande miniera di litio in Europa. Ha inoltre già acquistato l’80% delle case e dei terreni sopra il giacimento, favorita da una legge sulle espropriazioni varata ad hoc dal governo. 
❗La sospensione di questa legge, annunciata qualche giorno fa, è la prima vittoria delle proteste.

👉 Il litio è un materiale necessario per i veicoli elettrici e per lo stoccaggio di energie rinnovabili. 
Questa vicenda ci ricorda che è impensabile sostituire semplicemente le fonti di energia, mantenendo il modello di sviluppo, che, invece, va cambiato profondamente. E ci dimostra ancora che in questo cambiamento epocale la cittadinanza coinvolta in prima linea deve avere voce e potere decisionale.

#PowerToThePeople #protestworks #environment #mining #marssadrine

Ph da @guardian 

Posted @withregram • @xritaly

Title: NA
Description:
DIRTY SCRUBBERS TARGET MP’S OFFICE
Michelle Donelan’s office - Chippenham
The Local MP is letting down her constituents and our planet by actively voting against measures to protect our planet.
 
On Saturday 4th December a team of “Dirty Scrubbers” took on the challenge of “cleaning up” the office of the local MP for Chippenham, Michelle Donelan. The event included some theatrics where the scrubbers did some “cleaning” as well as talking to the public, handing out mince pies, with messages and banner drops. The protestors are all part of Extinction Rebellion from Chippenham, Bradford on Avon and other local XR groups.
Protestors argue that COP 26 failed to provide any confidence that the wealthy nations of the Global North, including the UK, are serious about addressing the climate and ecological emergency and they highlight deep concerns about Michelle Donelan’s voting record and support for the current government.
Louise Weissel an environmental activist from Bradford on Avon stated that “The CEE bill will require the UK to achieve climate and nature targets by giving the Secretary of State a duty to implement a strategy to achieve those targets. This bill is now supported by 118 MP’s as it is considered the only way to ensure that decisive, prompt and effective action is taken to support our fragile environment. Yet Michelle Donelan voted against this bill and in doing so, has voted against nature and the environment”
The recent amendment of the Environment Bill to arrest the catastrophic amount of sewage entering our waterways was also voted down by Michelle Donelan.
Mel Moden an Extinction Rebellion Activist from Chippenham said “In 2020 our local water company (Wessex Water) discharged raw sewage from storm overflows for 235,325 hours and this is deemed acceptable by our local MP who voted against measures to prevent this from happening. Once again the environment has come off second best to corporate profit”  

Continued in comments.. 

@michelledonelan 

Posted @withregram • @extinctionrebellionbath 

 #greenwashing

Title: NA
Description:
AS THE SEAS DIE, WE DIE

🐠 Today we teamed up with @theoceanrebellion to demand that the EU act now to stop industrial overfishing. 

🦐 Over the next two days EU ministers will be ‘negotiating’ next year's EU fishing limits in Brussels behind closed doors.

🐟 XR demands that the EU ministers ignore the interests of Industrial Fishing and listen to the science. The EU must place the marine ecosystem at the heart of its fishing policy by ending overfishing NOW. The EU must ban all Industrial Fishing in EU waters, and all Industrial Fishing by the EU fleet in extra-territorial waters or the waters of other states. Any former subsidies to Industrial fishers must be used to encourage low-impact fishing, by transitional grants to industrial fishing workers and subsidising the artisanal (or traditional small boat) fishing industry.

Posted @withregram • @xrbelgium 

#extinctionrebellion #sea #ocean #actnow #brussels

Title: NA
Description:
The time for words without action has come and gone. We no longer have the luxury of time to sit back and allow governments and private interests to destroy our future. Scientific predictions are increasingly dire; it is not hyperbolic to assert that the very future of humanity depends on the outcomes of these negotiations. Governments must immediately heed the growing demands of those already facing crisis and those who will face crisis and bravely reimagine our world in a way that guarantees everyone the right to live with dignity and in harmony with our planet.

The Era of Injustice is over!

Caption credit : @ecoresolution and @cop26coalition 

Graphic credits : @xrebellionuk

Title: NA
Description:
The last few weeks have seen massive actions demanding justice for our planet and for animals. 

Last week across Europe, Animal Rebels have been standing up to McDonald's, continuing the demand that they go plant-based by 2025.  With blockades and occupations in multiple cities in Germany and the Netherlands it's clear that we won't stop until McDonald's and corporations like it take real action. 

Justice can't happen without solidarity and we've seen an upsurge of powerful, disruptive and passionate action as COP26 leaves us with little more than disappointment. We've seen over 120 people arrested resisting against the  unjust imprisonment of nonviolent activists and just last weekend we joined Extinction Rebellion and shut down 13 Amazon fulfilment centres on black Friday, to protest the exploitation of all life. 

The rebellion doesn't start tomorrow, it's already happening. Now's your chance to get involved. 
 
Want to join an international group or start your own and take action against McDonalds?
Find more information here:
https://animalrebellion.org/local-groups/

@mcdonaldsuk if you’re wondering where we’ve been, don’t worry, we haven’t forgotten about you. 😉

We must focus on a model of degrowth in which we encourage local trade, free of exploitation and non-polluting, combined with responsible consumption and waste reduction. 

All this means that the only possible way is to put life at the center! Only a sustainable economic and social model that cares for nature and respects the biophysical limits of the planet can secure and protect life!

Title: NA
Description:
KRISIS IKLIM MEMPERPARAH KEKERASAN BERBASIS GENDER

Berbagai situasi krisis yang diakibatkan oleh krisis iklim memperparah kekerasan berbasis gender. Misalnya, perubahan iklim memengaruhi mata pencaharian masyarakat yang mengandalkan alam, seperti menangkap ikan dan bertani. Ketika mata pencaharian ini terancam, kemiskinan akan semakin parah. Dalam situasi ini, kesenjangan akses terhadap sumber daya dan kuasa pengambilan keputusan dalam keluarga maupun di ranah publik menyebabkan perempuan, anak, dan minoritas gender lebih rentan mengalami kekerasan.

Anak-anak perempuan jadi lebih sering dinikahkan dini, atau bahkan dijual, untuk mengurangi beban ekonomi keluarga. Perempuan bisa saja dipaksa untuk menjadi pekerja seks demi menambah penghasilan. Di sisi lain, para laki-laki yang biasanya menjadi tulang punggung keluarga akan mengalami stres yang tinggi karena kehilangan pekerjaan, sehingga bisa saja melampiaskan frustrasinya dengan melakukan kekerasan terhadap perempuan.

Sementara itu, minoritas gender, yang pada situasi bukan krisis saja amat rentan mengalami diskriminasi dan kekerasan, akan makin terpuruk dalam kondisi krisis. Dalam situasi krisis COVID-19, misalnya, banyak kawan transgender yang kehilangan pekerjaan dan kesulitan mengakses bantuan dari pemerintah karena tidak memiliki KTP. Di masa depan, krisis iklim akan meningkatkan frekuensi terjadinya pandemi, sehingga akan makin sering pula terjadi kekerasan berbasis gender yang menyertainya.

Perjuangan untuk memperlambat krisis iklim tak bisa lepas dari usaha-usaha penghapusan kekerasan berbasis gender. Mari, berontak bersama untuk menuntut keadilan iklim dan keadilan gender!

BREAKING: Activists block Adani's first trainload of coal!

Andy and Tammy have stopped the first trainload of coal from Adani’s controversial Carmichael mine near Bowen, Queensland this morning.
Tammy and Andy have used steel pipes to lock themselves onto the railway that is carrying Adani's coal.
The police are currently in attendance, with both Omodei and Paine, refusing to leave.
Paine says “Adani will claim that their first shipment of coal is a victory. But it’s certainly not a victory for our climate. That’s why people are going to keep resisting this mine, and any other new fossil fuel projects too.

Description:
ARRESTABLES NEEDED!

Please join us as we take action in solidarity with Wet’suwet’en land defenders who are being unjustly brutalized and arrested on their own lands.

Tomorrow (Friday, November 26th), we will be meeting at Devonian Harbour Park at 7:30 am (at the paved circle near the underpass).

We will then block Lion’s Gate Bridge at peak rush hour traffic. This is the first of many non-violent civil resistance actions over the coming weeks.

Come and show your support!

If you..

- Have no idea what to expect when it comes to the arrest process

- Are concerned about the consequences of arrest

- Want to hear from people just like you who have been arrested as part of non-violent, civil disobedience

DM us! We will connect you with information and resources.

And if you decide to be arrested tomorrow without having done research in advance, no worries! There will be an arrest support team present who can explain the process and answer your questions.

Bottom line, while arrest is your individual choice and responsibility, you don’t have to do it alone.

Join us and send a bold f-u to the systems of harm that are so clearly in operation.

Link in bio for the event details.

Title: NA
Description:
On Monday (22nd November) Ocean Rebellion visited the International Maritime Organisation (IMO), again.

If only we could leave the IMO alone. We would if they took environmental governance seriously. But they don't.

On the cold November morning three Fossil Fool Oil heads, representing industrial lobbying of the IMO, vomited oil and distributed dirty money to arriving delegates on the first day of the latest Marine Environmental Protection Committee (MEPC) meeting.

The IMO is the only international body responsible for the state of the oceans: there is no one else to turn to. Their membership is dominated by the shipping and fishing nations. They are directly and indirectly led by the interests of big oil. They are the UN agency with the most corporate delegates, roughly one third. 

The IMO is not fit for purpose, it cannot protect and conserve ocean environments, especially in an age when we need governance that goes well beyond conservation.

Furthermore shipping is inherently bound up with the interests of the oil industry. Shipping provides the only means for the oil industry to dispose of its waste product. This is burned in big ships’ engines as Heavy Fuel Oil (HFO), the dirtiest form of fuel. If ships didn’t burn it, its disposal would need to be paid for. Instead ships are designed to run on it and subsidised to do so. 

Of all forms of transport, shipping is alone in paying no fuel tax. 80% of ships burn HFO and 40% of what they carry is fuel. Cheap oil makes cheap shipping possible which perpetuates cheap consumption. 95% of all products travel by boat to the UK.

Ocean Rebellion demands the IMO severs all ties with the Fossil Fuel Industry and Acts Now to slash shipping emissions.

Posted @withregram • @theoceanrebellion 

Photo credit: Guy Reece

#NoMoreFishInTheSea
#AsTheSeaDiesWeDie
#SortYourShipOut
#OceanRebellion
#FossilFools

Title: NA
Description:
In view of all that happened during COP26, here are some devastating environmental issues from Sri Lanka, which we hope will help the world get a better perspective on challenges faced by the most affected countries like us. ⏳

In its latest Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC's) to the Paris Agreement, Sri Lanka has decided to bring down its renewable energy target to 70%, from the previous 80%. All while the country's energy authority unions keep pushing for new coal power plants and the government signing new contracts for LNG.

Meanwhile, the statistics used for Sri Lanka's forestry sector NDC dates back to 1996, where the last forest cover assessment was done using LANDSAT imagery. While the latest NDC pledges to increase forest cover from 29% to 32% with continuous deforestation, it's unlikely that the island has 29% forest cover to begin with. This lack of data in the forestry sector makes it difficult for activists to fight against deforestation. 🌳⛏️

The third and most significant issues is the X-Press Pearl disaster, the worst maritime disaster in the history of Sri Lanka. The ship contained 1,486 containers filled with chemicals, including 25 metric tons of nitric acid and 78 metric tons of nurdles (plastic pellets). This disaster has damaged our marine ecosystem, livelihoods of fishing communities, and its long-term impacts threaten the entire Indian Ocean. 🌊🐳💀

Even with tireless volunteer efforts to cleanup in the aftermath, most of the nurdles and toxic chemicals still remain. We also lack the local and international maritime laws to prevent such spills. Neither do we have transparency and accountability, with organizations like International Tanker Owners Pollution Federation (ITOPF) attempting to downplay the damage. So, we urge global leaders to strengthen international maritime laws, to prevent disasters like this from happening in the future. 🗣️

Show your support by sharing this video and tagging global leaders to strengthen international environmental and maritime laws to protect most affected countries. 🌎

Follow and support @xrebellionlk 
#YourGreedOurDeath #XPressFeeders #CleanupYourMess #SaveOurForestsSL #NoMoreEmptyPromises

Title: NA
Description:
BERONTAK DEMI KEHIDUPAN ATAU TERIMA KEPUNAHAN

COP26 sudah berakhir dan hasilnya tidak lebih dari pengecewaan masal, dimana para pemimpin dunia secara sadar mengirim jutaan orang ke kematian dini.

Climate Action Tracker telah mengkaji dari semua pembicaraan dan janji para negara, dunia tetap akan menuju ke pemanasan global di 2.4 derajat diatas suhu rata rata pra industri. Indonesia sendiri adalah salah satu negara dengan komitmen terburuk, dikaji setara dengan pemanasan 3-4 derajat jika seluruh dunia melakukan yang sama dengan Indonesia. 

Sekarang, di 1.2 derajat saja sudah ada 7.2jt masyarakat Indonesia yang harus menderita dan mengungsi di tahun 2021. Dengan berita bencana yang seakan akan datang setiap harinya di penjuru tanah air. Sampai separah apakah sebelum situasinya bisa berubah? 

Sayangnya para pemangku kebijakan seakan buta terhadap realita, masih banyak membicarakan investasi dan ekonomi yang ektraktif yang justru malah memperburuk situasi. Seakan buta akan realita, masih belum ada sikap tegas dari tingkat tertinggi negara untuk menyatakan bahwa ya kita sedang berada di keadaan darurat iklim, dan semua lapisan masyarakat harus bergerak bersama memutarbalikan situasi.

Tapi masih ada harapan. Suara rakyat adalah suara Tuhan, dan kebijakan publik pada akhirnya akan mengikuti opini publik. Mari jadi bagian dari dorongan opini publik dengan melakukan aksi langsung tanpa kekerasan di tempatmu masing masing, dimanapun kita berada, agar para pemangku kebijakan tidak bisa abai lagi terhadap kenyataan dan sains yang ada.

Mari kita semua bersuara demi kehidupan kita semua.

Mari kita berontak demi kehidupan.

Title: NA
Description:
COP will ultimately see utterly inadequate progress that tiptoes around corporate interests and appeases the fossil fuel lobby. According to Climate Action Tracker, commitments so far still mean we face a catastrophic 2.4C global heating by the end of the century.

COP26’s failure points to the need for a radical change of gear, a shift into emergency mode where all the world’s resources are directed at the climate crisis, and fossil fuels are phased out, not invited in.

Ben Carey, from Climate Call-Up, said: “This COP packed with fossil fuel lobbyists should be a wake-up call to citizens everywhere, especially those who have trusted politicians to deliver. The Climate Siren dramatises the dire peril we are in. We all need to radically step up pressure on governments. If we don’t, we’ll be hearing much louder and more regular sirens in our future, as the climate crisis hits humanity with full force.”

A better world is possible. 🌍💚
