Title: NA
Description:
SHELL OUT OF THE UK SCIENCE MUSEUM 

On Sunday, @xrlambeth rebels paid a visit to the UK Science Museum’s Our Future Planet exhibition to highlight Shell’s attempt at cleaning up their well-deserved reputation of worst climate offenders by sponsoring this exhibition.

The Science Museum has inspired generations of children and adults with a love of the natural world. Now more than ever, we need an inspiring and ethical vision of the future. We need our Museums to tell beautiful and powerful stories with integrity.

“The utter failure of governments and corporate interests to reverse destructive impacts on the planet’s survival systems threatens our civilisation and much of life on Earth. Shell continues to play a key role in the escalating crisis, but they are clear that their business depends on a societal licence to operate, Funding exhibitions allows Shell to borrow the prestige and implied endorsement of the Science Museum Group.

So why on earth is their exhibition on the climate emergency ‘Our Future Planet’ sponsored by Shell? 

The management of the Science Museum is not listening to the youth, the scientists, the public or even their own staff who all want the Museum to cut financial ties with fossil fuel companies.”

- Scientists for Extinction Rebellion

Demand 1: Tell The Truth 
We demand that the Science Museum Group immediately declare a climate and ecological emergency and reconsider its role in society accordingly. 

Demand 2: Act Now
We demand that the Science Museum Group cut financial ties with all fossil fuel companies and publicly denounce their persistent mischaracterisation of the science of climate change in the strongest possible terms.

@sciencemuseum 

Link: https://linktr.ee/stopshell 

Post Credit: @xrlambeth 

#ShellOut #ScienceMuseum #Shell #Ogoni9 #Ecocide #ClimateJustice #Lambeth #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #Greenwashing

Description:
PROTECT OLD GROWTH FORESTS 

Learn more: LINK IN BIO 

The Fairy Creek blockade has been going for months to prevent the logging of some of the last old-growth forests on Vancouver Island. 

✳️We must stand against the destruction that our government is allowing in the name of corporate greed. 

‼️There’s over 5 km of road-building approved into the Greater Fairy Creek Rainforest, including into the headwaters of the intact valley known as “Cloud Forest,” which is home to some of the oldest yellow cedar trees in Canada. ‼️

✳️The Fairy Creek blockade is the LAST STAND to protect these forests.

‼️The BC Supreme Court granted an injunction against the blockades earlier this year and activists are expecting RCMP enforcement. Since they don’t plan on backing down, arrests are likely. 

👉🏼👉🏾Repost from @xr_vancouver ‘s ride for Fairy Creek @fairycreekblockade. “We ride for old growth forests. We ride for our futures.”

 #ClimateEmergency #FairyCreekBlockade #ProtectOldGrowthForests #XRVancouver⁣ #LoveRageRebel #ExtinctionRebellion #ActNow #CivilDisobedience #Nonviolent #ClimateEmergency #ExtinctionIsForever #EcologicalEmergency #Protest #RebelForLife #TellTheTruth #Government #Injustice #Inequality #Democracy #CitizensAssemblies #FightClimateInjustice #BeyondPolitics #OurFuture #ClimateJustice #SystemChange not #ClimateChange

Title: NA
Description:
BP STOP THE GREENWASH

The protest, organized by a coalition of activist groups including @pollutersout @shalemustfall @bpnotbp @fossilfreelondon @cop26_extinctionrebellion and @frackofflondon called out BP for its misleading claims on the climate emergency. 

 ‼️The oil giant has already faced a significant backlash over its stated ambition to reach ‘net zero’ greenhouse gas emissions by 2050, which campaigners claim is full of loopholes, allows the continued destruction of frontline communities around the world, and is TOO LITTLE, TOO LATE for the climate. ‼️

‼️Mariafernanda Duran, one of the organizers of the action, said: 

"BP’s ‘Net Zero by 2050’ ambition is deceptive and no amount of greenwashing can hide the fact their extractivist practices in the Global South. With their current plans, they have prioritized profit over life. BP should not be investing $9 billion this year in fossil fuels, or planning to still be drilling in 2050. We call on BP to phase out their fossil fuel business entirely, in line with climate science.”‼️

👉🏽👉🏾👉🏼Despite research showing that the world can't even afford to burn existing fossil fuel reserves BP continues to push ahead with major new extractive projects in Argentina, Australia, and the Russian Arctic. 

There was a large number of police in attendance, but they did not actively interfere with the performance.

The protest was carried out in as COVID-safe a way as possible, with participants wearing masks and socially distancing. Today’s action is part of a new wave of climate protest that is likely to emerge as lockdown eases in the UK.

Photo Credit: Ron Fassbender | Rebecca Binda | Pamela 

#ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateEmergency #ClimateAction #ClimateCrisis #fossilfuelfree #shalemustfall #XRCOP26

Description:
EID MUBARAK⁣
⁣
This Eid we are sharing @xrmuslims statement on Sheikh Jarrah:⁣
⁣
What is #SaveSheikhJarrah? Sheikh Jarrah is a predominantly Palestinian neighbourhood in East Jerusalem, 2 km north of the Old City. 28 Palestinian families currently face the threat of forceful eviction, many already previously illegally evicted from Talbiya in 1948. ⁣
⁣
Forced removal of an occupied people is illegal under international law and Israel’s claim for Jerusalem remains disputed by the UN Partition Resolution. Palestinians continue being forcibly displaced to make way for Israeli settlers to take their homes. ⁣
⁣
Last month, Human Rights Watch released a statement declaring Israeli authorities of being guilty of apartheid against Palestinians. This Monday, Israeli police violently stormed Al-Aqsa mosque and attacked Palestinians worshipping during Ramadan. ⁣
⁣
Following the facts and XR principle #4, we openly challenge this deeply unjust, toxic system. XR Muslims stand in solidarity with the Palestinians. We urge everyone around us to call out on Israel’s illegal settlements and continued human rights violations.⁣
⁣
We invite our global community to share these statements far and wide, and to continue to share the words, names, images and stories of Palestinians worldwide to mitigate their erasure.⁣

Statement Credit: @xrmuslims 
Post Credit: @xrebellionuk

STOP SHELL’S EXTINCTION PLAN 

No banners, no decorating bridges, buildings or blockades today, but one smack in front of the headquarters of Robeco. 

Tuesday the 18th of May Shell will be presenting its ‘’energy-transition’’ plan in a general meeting. While there is a dire need for substantial transformation of the energy-sector, Shell packages yet more oil production and a doubling of gas production up to 2030 in some flashy greenwashing. This transition plan is really just an extinction plan. 

Shareholders, such as Robeco, have the power to reject the proposal, and demand Shell to be truly ‘future-proof’ and commit to actual transition instead of a masked continuation of current practices. This is exactly why we’re calling upon Robeco today to invest in our collective future, and reject #ShellsExtinctionPlan.

Demand accountability from Shell's shareholders  yourself by signing the petition in our bio.

Title: NA
Description:
GLOBAL SOUTH G7 ACTIONS CROWDFUNDER

This crowdfunder (link in bio) aims to enable Global South voices to take centre stage during G7 action so their voices are heard. 

Global South XR groups have a lot to say, obviously! Climate and ecological breakdown is affecting them terribly. Yet they are least responsible for the climate crisis, and have the least resources to mitigate.

One obstacle to being heard is a lack of social media infrastructure. This crowdfunder will: 

1. Provide funds to support the development of a thriving social media network in XR groups in the Global South. 

2. Create powerful social media campaigns and highlight attention-grabbing actions.

Each local XR group that is funded will receive €50 towards internet data costs and €200 to purchase a smartphone.

Training in social media use and campaigns will also be provided.

The actions aim to: 

1. Expose the hypocrisy of the G7 countries who signed the Paris Agreement, and yet continue to allow companies from their lands to heat the planet, and commit ecocide in the Global South.

2. Remind the countries in the G7 that they are hugely responsibility for the climate crisis we are in and need to pay climate debt, loss and damages for past destruction, lead the drive to decarbonise our societies and stop biodiversity loss.

It is time activists in the Global North stopped speaking on behalf of the Global South, and instead empowered activists and listened to what they have to say.

Link in bio to crowdfunder! 

#ClimateJustice #GlobalSouth #G7 #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #ExtinctionRebellion

Title: NA
Description:
XR BLOCKADE FASLANE NUCLEAR BASE FOR A SAFE, GREEN FUTURE 

✳️An all female group of XR Scotland rebels blocked Faslane’s North Gate to demand a ‘Safe, Green Future’, as part of the International Peace Lotus Campaign. 

👉🏼Climate activists from Extinction Rebellion Scotland, alongside veteran peace activists Trident Ploughshares, have blocked the North gate of the Faslane Naval Base in Gare Loch, home of the UK’s nuclear submarines. 

👉🏼The group placed three planters on the road containing plants and flowers painted with the words ‘Safe’, ‘Green’, and ‘Future’. A female Rebel locked onto each planter so that they cannot be moved, preventing access to the base.

👉🏽👉🏼👉🏿Emergency vehicles could still access the site via the South gate. The group took precautions for COVID-19 including social distancing and face masks.

✳️The action is part of the Peace Lotus campaign, a global day of anti-war resistance coordinated celebrating the anniversary of the end of the Vietnam war. 

As the ongoing Climate and Ecological Emergency  threatens people and the planet, we must come together to build a safe, more just future for all people.

Post Credit: @xrscotland 
Photos Credit: @susannahothamphotography & @cheyenne.loana

#ExinctionRebellion #XRPeace #XRScotland #PeaceLotus #AntiWar #AntiNuclearWeapons #AntiTrident #ClimatwCrisis #EcologicalCrisis

Title: NA
Description:
SOS COLOMBIA 

Thousands of people throughout Colombia came out to protest in the streets against the tax reform presented by Alberto Carrasquilla, former Minister of Finance.
 
The articles of the tax reform intended to increase and add taxes to products and servicies of basic necessities, public transportation, social investment projects, clean energy such as wind and sun energy, among others.
 
The national government’s response to the protest and to the disagreement of thousands of Colombians was violence and total repression.

From April 28, 2021 to May 4, 2021, there are 1.443 cases of violence committed by the public force (military and police) occurred at national level.

216 victims of physical violence, 31 victims of homicidal violence, 814 arbitrary arrests against protesters, 239 violent interventions in the framework of peaceful protests, 21 victims of eye attacks, 77 cases of firearms shooting, 10 victims of sexual violence.(NGO Temblores, 2021).

We condemn and reject the violent response of the Public Force and the Colombian State to social protest.

Help us to denounce this outrage against our life. We invite you to protest for all lives. 

Like, Comment and Share - this needs to be at the top of the agenda for all news media outlets. 

#SOSColombia #Colombia

Title: NA
Description:
ANOTHER WIN FOR NON-VIOLENT DIRECT ACTION IN A UK COURT

Rebels Rose and James were arrested in July last year for dying Trafalgar Square fountains red to symbolise the destruction the UK Government was inflicting on our plant and animals. The judge ruled that there was no evidence that any lasting damage had been caused and the charges have now been dropped. 

To paraphrase what the judge said in court to the prosecution "I'm sure there are much better things you can spend your time on prosecuting instead of these protesters". 

This ruling comes just weeks after six Extinction Rebellion rebels were cleared by a jury of causing criminal damage to Shell’s London headquarters, despite a judge saying they had ‘no defence in law’. 

Simon Bramwell (one of the six rebels) said: “This is such a significant victory for the consciousness of the British people when it comes to the huge, immediate threat of climate change and the absolute failure of our Government to do anything meaningful about it.”

Title: NA
Description:
DEFENDING NATURE IS NOT A CRIME 

18 Year Old Chinese Climate Activist, Howey went on a hunger strike against her unjust prison sentence. 

Howey’s statement: 

"I am on HUNGER STRIKE for 3 days and nights in Place De La Palud, Lausanne, Switzerland. It will start from 8AM, 19th Monday to 7PM 21st Wednesday. 

I am protesting against the unfair sentence of Vaud prosecutor in 30th March 2021, which might take me to PRISON for 60 days and FINE me 1200CHF for defending Mormont hill. 

Today, people are already suffering from Climate and Ecological Emergency. The environmental destruction caused by multinational corporations like Holcim is one of the reasons my hometown Guilin, China just suffered the largest flood in 200 years. 

We must set all the differences between humans aside and show the strongest solidarity to each other.
 
Media are important, everything counts. Welcome to come.

Love and rage,
Howey Ou"

#DefendNature #Justice #ClimateJustice #HungerStrike #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #ExtinctionRebellion #XR

Title: NA
Description:
REBELLION OF ONE ⁣
⁣
At 11am on Saturday 1st May 2021, two years to the day since the UK Parliament declared an environment and climate emergency, over 200 hundred people sat alone blocking roads in a courageous act of protest. 

Rebellion Of One⁣
⁣
The individual disruptive actions took across the UK – including in Scarborough, Weymouth, Birmingham, Oxford, Bradford, Ipswich, Lincoln, Canterbury, Newcastle, Portishead, London, Newquay, Swansea, Bangor in Northern Ireland and many more. This is a Climate Emergency⁣
⁣
This vulnerable act of peaceful civil disobedience by ordinary people across the UK - including doctors, nurses, teachers, students, parents and grandparents - highlighted the fear and frustration felt by many at the failure of the UK Government to take the climate and ecological crisis seriously. 

Governments Must Act Now⁣
⁣
“People may wonder what a nurse is doing sitting in the road with a placard. They may wonder what impact this will have on my career or whether I’ll get in trouble with the police. I am aware of the risks but I feel I have a moral duty to warn people about the catastrophic consequences of the climate crisis. We all witnessed how poorly the UK Government has managed the COVID-19 crisis. There isn't a plan in place to tackle the climate crisis. We cannot let this happen⁣.
 ⁣
We can still change things, we can demand the government acts now. What will our legacy be for future generations? Will it be apathy while witnessing how political greed destroys this planet? Or will it be action, actively fighting to build a safe world that children can live in?" 

- Andrea Muntiu, NHS Nurse, Ipswitch⁣

Join @extinctionrebellion today. We need everyone! 

Post Credit: @xrebellionuk 
⁣

Title: NA
Description:
SEB – NI HAR OLJA PÅ ERA HÄNDER

Vår förtvivlan och sorg över SEB:s investeringar i oljeindustrin är ofantlig. Men vi känner också vrede. Förbränning och borrning efter olja förgör och dödar liv på jorden. 

Idag, den 22 april 2021, genomförde XR Skåne en aktion mot SEB i Västra hamnen, Malmö. SEB är den bank, bland storbankerna, i Sverige som allra mest påskyndar klimatkatastrofen. Sedan Parisavtalet har SEB investerat 158 miljarder i fossilindustrin. Nyligen investerade SEB ytterligare 33.8 miljarder i oljeutvinning i Arktis – ett av världens mest sårbara ekosystem.

På SEB:s egna hemsida kan vi läsa följande: ”SEB har en stark ambition att bidra till hållbar utveckling och vi är fast beslutna att stödja våra kunder i omställningen till en koldioxidsnål ekonomi”.

Men detta rimmar dåligt med sanningen eftersom SEB använder en mängd kryphål för att fortsätta sina investeringar i fossilindustrin. Vi blir grundlurade och banken använder våra pengar, som blir till smutsiga oljepengar, i jakten på evig tillväxt.

VAD KAN DU GÖRA?

BYT BANK. Gå på Fair Finance guide https://fairfinanceguide.se/banks/byt-bank/

MAILA DIN BANK. Kräv att de omedelbart slutar med fossila investeringar.

AGERA. Gå med i Extinction Rebellion och bli en del av kampen. 

Post Credit: @extinctionrebellionskane

WE ARE IN AN EMERGENCY

✳️ Effecting meaningful and immediate change: DEGROWTH.

👉🏽 If we want to have a shot at halting the crisis, we need to slow down and restore the balance. 

👉🏽We need to change how we see nature and our place in it, shifting from a philosophy of domination and extraction to one that’s rooted in reciprocity and regeneration. 

We need to change and decolonise our systems!

Title: NA
Description:
GMO SOY KILLS! 

Rebels in Argentina are raising awareness towards GMO soy.

Genetically modified soybean cultivation does not solve the problem of hunger and destroys biodiversity. 

Each year, more than 17 million hectares of transgenic soy are sown in Argentina. This crop requires over 200 million litres of glyphosate, a poison currently found in our food. 

Pesticides cause spontaneous abortions, malformations, cancer and other pathologies in the exposed population. Those who suffer the most are the fumigators, which puts their lives and their families at risk.

So far, more than 6.5 million hectares of native forest were lost due to this crop. The native forest absorbs 10 times more rainwater than a soybean crop, thus preventing floods.

Besides, soy monoculture has displaced hundreds of communities and has put thousands of families out of work. 

Growing food for humans generates 38 times more jobs than growing food for industrialized animals.

We must transition to agroecology, a system that produces healthy food!

We must demand food sovereignty for our peoples!

Act now. Talk about this!

#GMO #GMOSoykills #LaSojaTransgenicaMata #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #Biodiversity #FoodSovereignty #FoodSystem #Agriculture #RegenerativeAgriculture

Title: NA
Description:
SAVE THE OKAVANGO DELTA

XR families and others gathered outside the Canadian Embassy in London to call on Canada and the G7 to halt petroleum exploration in the watershed of the Okavango Delta.

The Okavango Delta is a UNESCO world heritage site and home to the largest populations of wildlife remaining in Africa. 

Canadian company ReconAfrica estimates the area contains so much oil and gas that, if burnt, it would consume one sixth of the world's remaining carbon budget.

Post Credit: @extinction.rebellion.families 
Photo Credit: João Daniel Pereira

#OkavangoDelta #Recon #Ecocide #ExtinctionRebellion #XRFamilies #ClimateJustice #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #Canada #ReconAfrica

Title: NA
Description:
FREE THE TRUTH 

Extinction Rebellion women glue themselves to NBC’s Today Show windows and demand the media ‘Free the Truth’⁣. 
⁣
Wednesday 21st April 2021, three women from Extinction Rebellion glued themselves to the glass windows of NBC’s @TodayShow while live on air. The protestors placed signs on the windows of the show reading “Declare Climate & Ecological Emergency” and “Dear Media, Tell the Truth About The Crisis.”⁣
⁣
This action was in protest of the network’s failure to adequately report on the climate and ecological emergency. ⁣
⁣
Although NBC’s Today Show outperforms it’s morning news program counterparts, climate coverage as a whole made up only 0.4% of overall coverage on corporate broadcast morning, nightly and Sunday morning news shows in 2020. ⁣
⁣
The women acted knowing a growing number of women worldwide are becoming increasingly frustrated and fearful for the future of the planet, their own lives and their children. ⁣
⁣
📢DECLARE A CLIMATE EMERGENCY AND REPORT ACCORDINGLY!🔊⁣

Post Credit: @xr_nyc 
⁣

 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
We asked Oscar-winner Mark Rylance to read from a UNDP report that details the human rights abuses committed by WWF-funded park rangers against the Baka people in the Messok Dja national park in the Congo Basin.
 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
These abuses are common in many protected areas in Africa & Asia. Conservation NGOs like @WWF and @TheWCS support the theft of #indigenous peoples’ lands. The rangers they fund routinely beat, imprison, and sometimes kill them.
 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Conservation NGOs have known about this for many years. Others are aware of the abuse, but remain silent to protect their careers and funding. Their silence is complicity – it allows the atrocities to continue.
 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
If we want to change conservation, environmental & human rights NGOs must speak out, and so must we - for tribes, for nature, for all humanity.

Title: NA
Description:
EARTH DAY TAKEOVER 

Survival International x Extinction Rebellion 

Survival International will be taking over our Instagram for Earth Day. 🌎

From the Amazon to the Kalahari, from the jungles of India to the Congo rainforest, Survival International work in partnership with tribal peoples to protect their lives and land. They suffer racism, land theft, forced development and genocidal violence just because they live differently. It must stop.

They fight for tribal peoples’ survival. They stop loggers, miners, and oil companies from destroying tribal lands, lives and livelihoods across the globe. They lobby governments to recognize indigenous land rights. They document and expose the atrocities committed against tribal peoples in the name of conservation and campaign to stop them.

They give tribal peoples a platform to speak to the world. They’ve had over 200 victories since 1969, but their work is far from over and they need your help.

You can help prevent genocide, put an end to logging and mining on tribal lands, and stop government violence and oppression. 

Follow: @survivalinternational 

#EarthDay #Indigenous #IndigenousRights #IndigenousLand #ClimateJustice #SurvivalInternational #ExtinctionRebellion #InstagramTakeover

XRNYC joins NYCC, 350, Sunrise, Rise and Resist, and other environmental orgs to continue the Defund Line 3 campaign. ⁣
⁣
The protest started at Blackrock, where youth climate activist Xiye Bastida held a Blackrock CEO Larry Fink impersonator accountable for his company's continued funding of the climate crisis. ⁣
⁣
@Blackrock owns $9 TRILLION in assets, including $1.2 Billion in @Enbridge- the company building Line 3. If that wasn’t bad enough, they have $75 Billion invested in the top 30 tar sands companies. ⁣

They have the financial power to single handedly shift the direction of Wall St towards more sustainable investments, including moving quickly away from some of the dirtiest fossil fuel projects like tar sands. ⁣
⁣
Start by pulling the plug on Line 3! ⁣
⁣
#AllEyesOnBlackrock⁣
⁣
The second part of the action had the groups marching to @JPMorgan @Chase - the #1 banker of climate chaos and a major funder for the Line 3 pipeline. ⁣
⁣
Rebels locked down the construction site of their new multi billion dollar HQ for over an hour. As the largest bank on Wall St, CEO Jamie Dimon has shown little willingness to stop the suicidal profits from fossil fuels that are destroying our communities and our planet. ⁣
⁣
Stay tuned for more information on the #DefundLine3 - Global Day of Action coming up May 7th. DM @xr_nyc if you want to get involved.

Description:
Este martes el Senado tendrá que haber presentado las enmiendas a la Ley de Cambio Climático 📜

El futuro que esta Ley promueve es digno de una película de terror. No tenemos tiempo que perder, necesitamos medidas eficaces y urgentes contra la Crisis Climática 🚨

Solo tenemos una casa para toda la humanidad 🌍 Necesitamos una Ley a la altura de las circunstancias, que no permita a las empresas españolas seguir contaminando fuera ❌ y que deje las decisiones sobre esta Crisis en manos del pueblo con las Asambleas Ciudadanas vinculantes ✅

Si no quieres que nuestro futuro esté lleno de represión, escasez de alimentos y catástrofes naturales, únete a la rebelión 🔥💚

The needs of the local people and their traditional relationships with the natural world are ignored in view of  scientific conservation goals and so called western "experts". 

‼️The local people, however, are the ones who will lose their homes and livelihoods through protected areas without having a voice – an obvious form of racism.‼️

How can we kick racism out of conservation? 

👉🏽 LINK IN BIO.

Title: NA
Description:
SOLIDARITY WITH AMAZONIA & ITS GUARDIANS 

The fate of Amazonia and its guardians is linked to our own future: Europe must stop its double dealing and act immediately! 

👉🏾 Join us and sign the petition - link in bio. 

To address the absolute emergency in which Amazonia finds itself, indigenous leaders from Brazil, young people mobilized for the climate and more than 70 associations from Europe and the American continent are joining forces to call for, among other things:

1. The creation of a coalition of European parliamentarians

2. The cancellation of the EU-Mercosur free trade agreement

3. The immediate freeze of imports linked to deforestation

All free trade deals speed up the destruction of our Mother Earth by making extractivism cheaper and less regulated. They give corporations even further rights to exploit people and ecosystems, without governments being able to protect them: companies can sue governments under the deal whenever their environmental, labour and health regulations interfere with their profits

Free trade deals throw small farmers into full competition with agro-industry, destroying their livelihoods. They break local and regional markets and ship products around the globe following profit, when they could be made locally. They expand industrial activity and in doing so dispossess local communities of their lands, furthering the historical process of colonisation. 

This trade deal is one of many we must stand against. 

The UK government is also negotiating a free trade deal with Bolsonaro https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/uk-brexit-trade-deal-brazil-amazon-labour-a9077926.html 

We must remain vigilant to ensure that the survival and flourishing of communities and ecosystems are always placed above profit!

👉🏾 Sign the petition - link in bio. 

#SOSAmazonia #StopUEMERCOSUL #SayNoUEMERCOSUR #AllianceOfGuardians #DemarcationNow #DemarcaçãoJá #DemarcationMaintenant #ClimateJustice #SocialJustice #IndigenousRights #IndigenousPeoples #TerrasIndigenas #ProtectTheAmazon #GuardiansOfTheEarth #NoMoreEmptyPromises #DefendTheDefenders #ExtinctionRebellion #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis

Title: NA
Description:
GLOBAL MONEY REBELLION 

April sees a wave of actions happening across the UK and the world - including Brussels, Paris and Melbourne - targeting the financial system and private and central banks in particular.

This wave of actions by XR’s Money Rebellion is designed to expose the role of banks in the climate and ecological crisis. The world's 60 largest banks have funded the fossil fuel industry to the tune of $3.8 trillion since 2016.

The actions in this live-stream highlight the Bank of England's failure to regulate these banks and points to the fact that it still holds investments consistent with 3.5C of warming by the end of the century.

🎥 WATCH: LINK IN BIO

What drives this suicidal inaction is our economic system. Addicted to infinite GDP growth and ever-increasing profits for the rich, this system requires more burning of fossil fuels, more resource extraction, more deforestation and more consumption. The multiple crises that we face - climate change, inequality, overconsumption of the planet's resources - cannot be addressed without changing the system that drives them.

This was live-streamed by the XR Live Streaming team whose mission is to Tell the Truth and spread the news that mainstream media is failing to do.

Title: NA
Description:
TELL THE TRUTH 
⁣
The more @NewsCorpAus lies, the sooner our planet dies! 💀🌏🥀⁣
⁣
Rebels here and around the world are mobilising against Rupert Murdoch! We won’t retreat until his empire TELLS THE TRUTH. ⁣
⁣
Yesterday, rebels descended on #NewsCorpse HQ in Naarm/Melbourne with our three Murdoch-specific demands. ⁣
⁣
NewsCorp must:⁣
⁣
1. #TellTheTruth and report in every outlet that the planet is experiencing a human-caused climate and ecological emergency.⁣
⁣
2. Stop providing a platform for climate deniers.⁣
⁣
3. Join the Covering Climate Now initiative, which exists to address the urgent need for better climate coverage.⁣
⁣
For decades the Murdoch media empire has fed the public a constant stream of lies and climate denialism. Masquerading as journalism, the Murdochracy’s sustained campaign of disinformation is specifically designed to support climate-denying politicians and the power elite in the fossil fuel industry.⁣
⁣
In 2011, Prof. Robert Manne published research revealing that for every column published in @The.Australian newspaper accepting the need to act on climate, four were run attacking it. Since then the Murdochracy’s coverage of the climate crisis has worsened.⁣
⁣
In March 2020, Monash University found that NewsCorp publications represented 59% of all climate denialist discussion in Australia. It also revealed that 84% of articles criticising @schoolstrikeforclimate and Extinction Rebellion protestors came from NewsCorp.⁣
⁣
@xrvic_aus’s Murdoch affinity group say:
⁣
“The Murdoch empire and their well documented history of highly orchestrated propaganda, deception, and lies has had a devastating impact on the climate and ecological debate here and overseas. It’s high time they learned some journalistic ethics and told the truth.”⁣
⁣⁣
🎨 Murdoch’s magnificently dreadful puppet head made by @KateeMoon ⁣
⁣
Photo Credit: James Ross, Julian Meehan, Danielle Judd & Matt Hrkac
⁣
Post Credit: @xrebellionaus
 
#AutumnRebellion2021 #ClimateEmergency #ClimateCrisis #RebelForLife #RebelForLove #SystemChangeNotClimateChange #ExtinctionRebellion #FreeTheTruth

SAVE THE OKAVANGO DELTA

👉🏾Sign the petition (link in bio). 

Recon Africa, a Canadian headquartered junior oil & gas company, begun exploratory drilling in the Kavango Basin in Namibia, having completed the first of three initial exploratory wells

❗This development goes against the Convention Concerning the Protection of the World Cultural and Natural Heritage, of which Namibia, Botswana, and Canada are all signatories. 

🆘The oil & gas drilling operations will ruin roads, damage indigenous livelihoods, deplete water resources and negatively impact fragile biodiversity within the precious region.

Title: NA
Description:
LOVE & RAGE & HOPE 🙌 Tidal Wave is a protest pop project, a celebration of unity and an invitation to join the wave of change!

It might feel like our actions are a drop in the ocean, but when we come together we can have a big impact - together we are powerful. And in the face of climate crisis - we would rather BE the Tidal Wave of Change than be destroyed by the Tidal Wave.

In a year of lockdown we’ve all had moments of feeling alone. Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but one day we WILL move our bodies together; to march, to shout and to DANCE! Can't wait to move to this track with you at the next in person protest!

LOVE forever. In the face of destruction and greed we will never stop loving our planet, our community and ourselves.

RAGE can be beautiful. We are justly furious at the destruction of our home. Let’s use this energy to create a new future.

The TIDAL WAVE is rising! Now is the perfect time to join with your local XR Group, to support each other and find ways to protect our beautiful planet. What actions can we do today? How can we prepare for the future?

Join the wave and learn more about what you can do. Search for Extinction Rebellion in your country or town - head to the link in bio and click WHY REBEL?

You are not alone. Across the distance from hub to hub this project was remotely created. Many of us did not know each other before we were united for this project, now we are stronger together.

Music by: DREAMFILTER Ft @nadinewildpalm
Written & produced by: @stephanie_singer_ and @slowshudder

Studio footage shot at @fourcorners_e2

Title: NA
Description:
BRAZIL JOINS THE MONEY REBELLION TO SAVE BIODIVERSITY

Brazilian rebels flyposted front of agencies with the messages:
"Banks suffocate human rights"
"Your money finances deforestation, death and invasion of indigenous lands"
"These banks [Banco do Brasil and BNDES] finance the death of the planet"

In Brazil, banks are destroying biodiversity and human rights by supporting Industrial Agriculture and being loyal to the genocide government of Jair Bolsonaro.

Banco do Brasil is by far the largest financier of this sector [agricultural and livestock]. Between 2016 and 2020, around $30 billion were invested in a federal program called rural credit. In the same period, BNDES was the largest provider of resources to companies accused of causing deforestation: $3.8 billion only in April 2020. More than half of this amount went to the meat sector, followed by the pulp and paper industry.

#extinctionrebellionbrasil #rebel #extinctionrebellion #tellthetruth #banks #destruction #aboiadanaovaipassar #forabolsonaro #forasalles #ricardosalles #povosindigenas #meioambiente #actnow #bancodobrasil #desmatamentozero #reflorestamento

Title: NA
Description:
🕺DISCO or DEATH 💀 

Dressed in their finest disco regalia. Rebels blocked multiple intersections in the city as they danced to the Bee Gees immortal hit Stayin’ Alive.

This was a fun action with a serious message.

XR music maestro Anna Slynn said that:

“Until such time as the Government acts, it’s crucial that we come together to let our leaders know that we will not sit back as they let the planet burn. We are dancing for our lives!”

“Australia was a world-leader in its response to Covid-19. We need to show the same courage, determination, and common sense in confronting the climate emergency”

This action took place on the unceded lands of the Kaurna people. We pay respect to elders, past and present. We acknowledge their sovereignty and ongoing resistance against the destructive forces of capitalism and colonialism which are fuelling the climate and ecological crisis.⁣

Post Credit: @extinctionrebellionsouthaus

Title: NA
Description:
THE CLIMATE AND ECOLOGICAL CRISIS IS VIOLENCE 
 
Pada tanggal 19 Maret 2021, XR Indonesia turut berpartisipasi dalam aksi Krisis Iklim Makin Parah, Masa Depan Banjir Darah sebagai bagian dari acara Climate Justice Now dan Global Climate Strike yang diselenggarakan di 68 negara.

Aksi ini adalah bentuk teriakkan dari warga Indonesia dalam menuntut aksi dan komitmen nyata dari pemerintah untuk menghidari masa depan yang penuh dengan bencana dan kematian akibat krisis iklim yang masih terus memperburuk.

Kebijakan iklim Indonesia masih membawa kita ke kehancuran ekologis dan ini adalah aksi bunuh diri secara perlahan yang dibebani ke semua warga Indonesia dan juga dunia. Cairan merah digunakan sebagai lambang nyawa yang telah dan akan hilang di seluruh dunia akibat krisis iklim dan ekologi.

Keadaan iklim di Indonesia beserta dengan kebijakan iklim Indonesia masih membawa kita semua skenario kehancuran dan penuh bencana yang tiada hentinya, dan untuk menghindari ini, sangat amat dibutuhkan deklarasi darurat iklim dari tingkat tertinggi negara, dan juga perubahan semua kebijakan yang bertolak belakang dengan net zero 2070 yang baru baru ini diumumkan.

Mari terus menyuarakan tuntutan yang sama agar perubahan yang kita butuhkan bisa terjadi, salah satunya dengan mengisi petisi change.org/stopbencana

#2070KeburuPunah
#MenolakPunah

Title: NA
Description:
WE REFUSE TO BE THE LAST GENERATION
⁣
@xr_youth_aus setup a road block on an exit to the West Gate Freeway, Melbourne. ⁣
⁣
Akira, from XR Youth Sydney and XR Youth VIC, sat at the top of a 6 meter high steel tripod.
⁣
Akira, a 17 year old Cyber Security student:⁣
⁣
"As the people who will inherit an uninhabitable planet, we the youth have been abandoned to death. The magnitude of the climate and ecological crisis demands immediate action, which the government has failed, on numerous counts, to address. On our current trajectory, we are heading for 4°C of warming by the end of the century, maybe sooner. This will result in societal collapse and billions of deaths. The ecosystems that we depend on for our survival are already starting to fall apart. The extent to which the Morrison Government can ignore this and disregard so many lives and biodiversity is painfully ludicrous."⁣
⁣
"The system relies on the fear of the people to maintain the status quo. We are choosing to be arrested because we know what we are doing is right. By disrupting business-as-usual we are bringing attention back to the harmful impacts of fossil fuel corporations on our future. We are trying to save our own lives and those of future generations."⁣
⁣
This action took place in Naarm/Melbourne on the unceded lands of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nation. ⁣

Post Credit: @xrbondibeach

Title: NA
Description:
JUSTICE FOR WOMEN 

It’s the Suffragettes! They’re calling for governments to tell the truth about the climate crisis and declare a climate emergency! ⁣
⁣
From @XRTasmania:⁣
⁣
“The Suffragettes represent a legacy of civil disobedience in women’s activism at a time when our democratic rights are under serious threat.⁣
⁣
Women worldwide and over centuries have been fighting for fairer treatment, and in particular to have a say in decisions that impact them.⁣
⁣
Now is the time to have climate-wrecking decisions reviewed and fixed. We demand climate action now!”⁣
⁣
✊🏿✊🏽✊🏾⁣✊🏼✊
⁣
The blows of climate collapse will fall more heavily on women. Women are disadvantaged in access to resources, education and decision making and more likely to care for children and elderly family. This will literally slow down the attempts of women to get to safety or to recover. Domestic violence surges during times of crisis and there are fewer options for support.⁣
⁣
📣 There is no climate justice without justice for women 📣⁣
⁣
Post Credit: @xrebellionaus

Title: NA
Description:
CITIZENS’ ASSEMBLIES NOW 

Esta mañana, rebeldes del movimiento han simulado frente al Ministerio de Asuntos Sociales y Agenda 2030, la Asamblea Ciudadana que exigimos al gobierno para mitigar los peores efectos de la crisis climática y ecológica y que también es nuestra 3ª demanda.

100 sillas vacías sobre el asfalto han representado la asamblea que el gobierno sigue sin convocar y una cadena de rebeldes ha protegido la representación cortando los cinco carriles del Paseo del Prado. 

Expertos como Fernando Valladares (CSIC) o Luis González Reyes (EeAa) han presentado datos sobre la crisis climática que vivimos y los principales objetivos para garantizar una transformación ecológica profunda y socialmente justa, capaz de preservar el derecho a la vida de las generaciones actuales y venideras.

Post Credit: @esxrebellion

Title: NA
Description:
RED BRIGADE SRI LANKA 

On Friday, 19th March 2021 at the Global Climate Action to Stop Ecocide Sri Lanka the Red Rebel Brigade made its first appearance. 

The Red Brigade are a group dedicated to shedding light on the global environmental crisis and the climate emergency, and supports environmental groups to save humanity and all species from extinction. ♥️

The Red Rebel Brigade symbolises the common blood we share with all species, that unifies us and makes us one.

As such we move as one, act as one and more importantly feel as one. 

We are unity and we empathise with our surroundings, we are forgiving.

We are sympathetic and humble, compassionate and understanding,

We divert, distract, delight and inspire the people who watch us.

We illuminate the magic realm beneath the surface of all things and we invite people to enter in, we make a bubble and calm the storm, we are peace in the midst of war.

We are who the people have forgotten to be! 🌎♥️👫🐆🐗🐘🐳

——

Red Rebel Brigade යනු ගෝලීය පාරිසරික විනාශය වැලැක්වීමට Extinction Rebellion සමඟ සක්රීයව දායකවන ස්වෙච්ඡා ක්රියාකාරීන්ගෙන් සැදුම්ලත් කණ්ඩායමකි. ♥️

ඔවුන්ගේ රතු පැහැති ඇදුමෙන් සංකේතවත් වන්නේ ලෝකයේ  සියලු ජීවීන් රත්පැහැයෙන් යුත් එකම රුධිරයෙන් ජීවය ලැබූවන් බවයි.  එබැවින් සියලුම ජීවීන් සාමූහිකව ම්හිමත ජීවත්විය යුතු බව ඔවුන්ගේ මතයයි. 

ඔවුන් සියලු ජීවීන් එකම මවකගේ දරුවන් බව විශ්වාස කරයි. එම නිසා සියලු ජීවීන් හට ඔවුන්ගේ දයානුකම්පාව හිමිවේ.

එමෙන්ම ඔවුන් දෙස බලාසිටින සියල්ලන්ටම සියලු ජීවීන්ගේ පැවැත්මේ වටිනාකම දැනුම් දීමටත්, එය ඔවුන්ගේ සිත්තුලට කාවැද්දීමටත් මොවුන්  කටයුතු කරයි. 

මහා කුණාටු සනහාමින්, මිනිසත්බව අමතකවූ මිනිසුන්ට යලි පණ දීම ඔවුන්ගේ අධ්ශ්ඨානයයි. 🌎♥️👫🐆🐗🐘🐳

Title: NA
Description:
STAND TOGETHER⁣
⁣
Yesterday we stood alongside many others in grief, in rage, in love, and in protest⁣.
⁣
The Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts Bill is yet another assault on democracy and human rights by this government. We need to stop violence against women, stand up for racial justice, end inequality and poverty, recover from covid, and defend our future from the climate and ecological crisis. And an increase in police powers that infringes on our right to protest will not solve any of this. 

#KillTheBill 
⁣
Thousands of people came to Westminster yesterday to hold a vigil to reflect on the death of Sarah Everard, Sarah Reed and all those who have died at the hands of gendered and police violence. Thousands came to say the bill, a blatant attempt to create an authoritarian police state, where the voices of ordinary people, particularly those most marginalised and disadvantaged, are silenced by state sanctioned penalties, is not the answer.

#KillTheBill⁣
⁣
This bill is a blatant erosion of democracy, but we've seen so many others from this government. Which is why we demand an upgrade to democracy, giving power to representative citizens assemblies to decide our future. To kill the bill, we will not only have to bring down statues but continue to protest until we bring down this government.⁣
⁣
#KillTheBill⁣
⁣
WE WILL NOT BE SILENCED! 

Post Credit: @xrebellionuk 
⁣
#UniteForHumanRights #SaveOurDemocracies #ActNow #PoliceCrackdownBill #CivilDisobedience #ProtectOurRightToProtest #Nonviolent #FreedomToProtest #Protest4Protest #BlackLivesMatter #NHSpayrise #ReclaimTheseStreets #WomensRights #RightToProtest #ClimateEmergency #EcologicalEmergency #RebelForLife #Injustice #Inequality #FightClimateInjustice #ClimateChangeIsReal #OurFuture #ClimateJustice #SystemChange not #ClimateChange

Title: NA
Description:
The burning of the Amazon forest should be a crime. So should be the massive Deepwater Horizon oil spill, destructive industrial fishing or plastic pollution. But they are not. 

The destruction of our natural world continues. Because governments and profit- driven companies face no real legal consequences for destroying nature. 

This is due to a huge gap in international law. The destruction of ecosystems- called ecocide-  is not listed as a crime. It's time to change the rules. 

Together we can change international criminal law to protectour ecosystems. Let’s make ecocide an international crime! For that we need your voice and your support. Sign the international petition (link in bio) and become an Earth Protector.

Title: NA
Description:
INTERNATIONAL WOMEN’S DAY 

The links between women's oppression and the climate and ecological crisis are deep. 😟

Have you realised how society sees nature as something to be conquered and dominated in order to exploit and profit from its resources? 💪🌲💰

What about how the systems in which most of us are socialised and conditioned to also see women as something to be conquered and dominated, meanwhile exploiting and profiting from women's unpaid labour? 💪🚺💰

Womxn (being just one of the many marginalised groups relentlessly f*caked over by white patriarchal systems and structures) are seriously and disproportionately hit by the collapsing climate and ecological systems.

From sky-rocketing domestic violence cases during mandatory lockdowns, to the severe loses of jobs, the COVID-19 pandemic has exposed the struggle women face everyday. 

Patriarchal oppression is present in so many aspects of our societies. Even now, we as XR Youth Solidarity are starting to understand and confront the ways in which white, patriarchal socialisation makes our organising spaces toxic for female-bodied people.🤔

Post Credit: @xryouthsolidarity 

#InternationalWomensDay #EcoFeminism #SmashThePatriarchy

Title: NA
Description:
✊🏾✊🏼 INTERNATIONAL WOMEN’S DAY ✊🏿✊🏽

Thank you @survivalinternational for amplifying inspirational indigenous women for #InternationalWomensDay 
⠀⠀
1. Women in Brasilia protesting against Bolsonaro’s anti-indigenous government in 2019. #StopBrazilsGenocide 
⠀
2. A Yanomami woman from the community of Watoriki, Brazil. In 2020 the Yanomami collected 430,000+ signatures for their #MinersOutCovidOut campaign.
⠀
3. Damiana Cavanha has led a 3-year-long “re-occupation” of their land & still fights for her people’s land rights.

“This is our ancestral land & I will be back!” #TribalVoice

4. The Dongria Kondh inspired millions with their ‘David and Goliath’ victory against mining giant Vedanta Resources in 2014. Modi’s government is intent on opening up tribal lands to mining.
⠀
5. Paulette, from the Baka tribe, was beaten by rangers backed by @wwf for collecting food from her ancestral land - but she won't be silenced. 

“There they beat me badly" #TribalVoice
⠀
6. Jenu Kuruba women from Nagarhole Tiger Reserve, India. The Jenu Kuruba have written to US authorities urging them to scrap support for a conservation project that could lead to the eviction of tribes from their forests.
⠀
7. Soni Sori is an Adivasi activist from India, who supports women to speak out about sexual violence & abuse from the authorities. She’s also actively fighting Factory Schools. 
⠀
8. Indigenous leader Sheila Juruna during a demonstration in 2011, calling for the halting of 3 mega-dam projects in the Amazon.
⠀
9. @guajajarasonia is the coordinator of @apiboficial, 1 of Brazil’s main indigenous organisation. She is 1 of the women leading the national indigenous resistance to Bolsonaro’s government attack on their rights & lands.
⠀
10. Kuni Sikaka is an indigenous activist from Odisha, India, who fought for over a decade for her people’s land rights against Vedanta’s mining plans: for her activism she was dragged out of her house at night, arrested & paraded in front of local media.

#IndigenousWomen #IndigenousRight #IndigenousLand #ChooseToChallenge #IWD2021 #Justice #ClimateJustice

Title: NA
Description:
STOP EACOP 

French oil giant Total and the China National Offshore Oil Corporation are on the cusp of building a massive crude oil pipeline right through the heart of Africa – displacing communities, endangering wildlife and tipping the world closer to full-blown climate catastrophe.

The East African Crude Oil Pipeline needs to be stopped and StopEACOP have a plan to do exactly that.

Already more than one million people have raised their voices – together we can #StopEACOP in its tracks and support sustainable and just alternatives driven for and by the people of East Africa.

HOW? 

ACT LOCAL - Support the communities on the front line

Local communities, human rights defenders and environmental activists are doing all they can to resist the pipeline, but they are facing increasing pressure and threats for speaking out against the corporate and political interests backing EACOP. We need to support their work and ensure their voices are heard loud and clear.

GO GLOBAL - Stop the flow of money

Building the biggest heated oil pipeline in the world is expensive work. Fortunately Total and CNOOC can’t do it alone – they need support from investors, banks and insurance firms around the world. It’s our job to highlight the risks, crank up the pressure in boardrooms and make sure EACOP is starved of the corporate and political support it needs.

WHY? 

FOR PEOPLE - EACOP threatens to displace thousands of families and farmers from their land and has already disrupted the livelihoods of many. If allowed to move forward, it would also place at risk vital water sources that millions of people rely upon for drinking and food production.

FOR NATURE - EACOP will rip through some of the world’s most important elephant, lion and chimpanzee nature reserves. There’s also concern that the pipeline will open up more critical ecosystems to even more oil extraction. 

FOR CLIMATE - EACOP will fuel climate change by enabling the extraction of oil which will generate over 34 million tons of CO2 emissions every single year. To solve the climate crisis, we must stop building new fossil fuel projects.

WHAT NEXT?

JOIN THE CAMPAIGN: Link in Bio

Post Credit: @extinctionrebellionsa

Title: NA
Description:
CLIMATE CHAOS IS KILLING US 

Climate chaos is killing us. Texas freezing below zero is only the latest, after floods, fires, mudslides, superstorms and more.

On Wednesday, March 3, 2021 Extinction Rebellion, with New York Communities for Change, Sunrise Movement, 360.org, Rise and Resist and the Rainforest Action Network, protested JP Morgan Chase and BlackRock.

Why JP Morgan Chase and Blackrock? They are the world's largest funders of climate chaos, investing hundreds of billions of dollars in fossil fuels that pollute the air, cook the planet, and displace indigenous communities. We urge them to #StopTheMoneyPipeline​.

Recently, Chase and BlackRock have attempted to appease the public with climate announcements, but their plans are vague and dangerously inadequate. Ultimately, their actions continue to fuel climate destruction.

We demand Chase and BlackRock stop financing fossil fuels and human rights violations. In particular, we demand the immediate halt to financial support for all companies in coal, in tar sands oil, and that fuel Amazon fires and violate indigenous sovereignty, including the Line 3 Pipeline.

Send a direct email to CEOs now to demand that they stop funding the toxic Line 3 pipeline:
https://stopthemoneypipeline.com/defund-line-3

Title: NA
Description:
THE FUTURE OF CONSERVATION: COP26 & BEYOND 

The Future of Conservation: COP26 and Beyond brings together 4 Indigenous and local leaders from Afrika (Tanzania, Kenya) and Abya Yala (México, Brazil), with 2 academics (to be confirmed) for a moderated discussion on the future of conservation. 

👉🏾 Link to register in @XRYouthSolidarity Bio 👈🏼

COP26 is deemed by Prof Tim Flannery as 'humanity’s last chance to avoid an environmental apocalypse'. This panel is a call to action to begin building solidarity ties between Indigenous and local community leaders and academics, in order to bring a united front to COP26. The aim of this panel is not only to discuss, but to set goals and pathways to mobilize for a justice-based future of conservation.

Over the last few years there has been an increasing level of exposure around the ongoing human rights abuses and land grabs committed in the name of wildlife conservation by numerous Global North NGOs. This panel is born out of the #DecoloniseConservation campaign, a youth education, action and solidarity campaign which seeks to mobilise the Global North environmental movement against fortress and colonial conservation in solidarity with Indigenous and local communities.

#DecoloniseConservation, an engagement campaign from XR Youth Solidarity, proposes that conservation efforts responding to the climate crisis must be led by Indigenous and/or local communities, and that the role of Global North conservation organizations must be transformed to ensure a future of conservation based on justice.

Join us for what promises to be an exciting panel to mobilize for a new paradigm of conservation.

📅 Friday, 5th March 2021
⏰ 5.00PM (GMT) 
📍 Zoom 

Check out more of our campaign to #DecoloniseConservation 

#WTFWWF #TheBigGreenLie #NatureNeedsJustice #ClimateJustice #ExtinctionRebellion 

@alianzabosques @SurvivalInternational @ifnotusthenwho @insight_share @
@XR_Youth

Title: NA
Description:
🌳 El Grito de la Selva (The Cry of the Rainforest) 🌳

🚨We have received an urgent request from the Indigenous peoples of the Amazon (COICA). They are asking us to do a small action today, Friday 26th February 2021!

📰 As you will have heard on the news, the Indigenous people of the Amazon have been suffering terribly during these times due to COVID-19. But what you might not have heard is that as they have retreated into isolation to escape infection. And companies and individuals have taken this opportunity to further grab forest land.  

There is a sense of depression and losing heart.  

But they have created an action this weekend, to shout out against this injustice and have asked us to support them.   

The Action:  👉🏾 Send a message of support by writing these words on paper or card: El Grito de la Selva The Jungle Screams). Take a picture and post on your social media channels with the hashtags: #ElGritoDeLaSelva #SOSAmazonia #AmazoniaVivaHumanidadSegura

If you have time to make it look beautiful, great. But if you don’t, just send the words and some love. Please write where you come from so they can see where the support is coming from. 

They cannot see us all, but let’s help them feel they are not alone – we stand with them in their suffering as they defend what is precious to us all.💚

Photo Credit: Weaving Ties # Tejiendo Lazos 

#IndigenousRights #Amazon #TheAmazon #ClimateJustice #HumanRights #Justice #TheJungleScreams

Title: NA
Description:
🌊 WORLD WATER DAY 🌊 

We aim to fund 20+ local Extinction Rebellion groups in the Global South, particularly in Africa, so that all rebels can take meaningful action on World Water Day, irrespective of where we are located. 

❔Why World Water Day❔

Because water is a life or death issue especially in the time of COVID-19: two in five people still do not have basic hand washing facilities. One in three people have no access to drinking water. 

And the effects of climate change ravage many countries in the Global South with altered rainfall patterns, flooding and drought. 

While extractive industries pollute precious water. 

So rebels in many countries in the Global South want their voices to be heard!

❔How Will Funding Be Spent❔

Rebels in the Global South are planning a wide range of actions from protest, to awareness raising and practical solutions. Support is urgently needed!

👉🏾 DONATE NOW (Link in Bio)

Title: NA
Description:
🔴 POLITYCY! POLITYCZKI 🔴

Mylicie się wierząc, że płoty waszych urzędów czy granice państwa, uchronią was przed globalnym chaosem, brakiem wody i migracją milionów uciekających przed śmiercią. 

Bez względu na to skąd przyszliśmy i dokąd planowaliśmy pójść, razem zmierzamy w tym samym kierunku. Paradoksalnie, jesteście jednymi z nas. Zmierzacie razem z nami ku krawędzi i zamiast zawrócić natychmiast, kłócicie się czy zawrócić przez lewe czy prawe ramię, wpychając nas w przepaść masowej zagłady. 

Stoimy dziś solidarni w strachu, gniewie, trosce, miłości. My, zwykli ludzie.

Koniec czekania. Czas na bunt.

Title: NA
Description:
DECOLONISE CONSERVATION

‘Listen to this Baka man explain how he was tortured for hunting to feed his family. [...] Across Africa, tribal people are accused of “poaching” because they hunt to feed their families. And they face arrest, beatings, torture and death, while big game trophy hunters are encouraged.’ - @survivalinternational

Not only does the treatment of Indigenous and local communities so blatantly violate human rights, it also dramatically affects our chances of averting climate and ecological collapse. Indigenous people safeguard a whopping 80% of the entire Earth’s land biodiversity, despite only being 5% of the human population.

Local communities are equally essential in protecting and strengthening biodiversity! They too are on the frontlines of collapsing ecosystems and environmental degradation, with invaluable knowledge of how to look after their land.

Fortress Conservation, the violent model of conservation, was initiated by white-supremacist Western “conservationists” to preserve their exclusive access to what they consider ‘pristine’ landscapes for the benefit of the elites, rather than the environment, excluding those who had lived and cared for the land for centuries. This model has since been exported across the world to now involve a sinister joint enterprise of large conservation organisations such as @WWF WildlifeConservationSociety, NatureConservancy, @ExxonMobil @Bp_plc @Shell @CocaCola @WorldBank @the_IMF and local and national governments.

Together they continue to create a world divided into “Developed” areas - destroying the ecosystem - and “protected areas” - where locals and their cultures are removed. Instead, we must all learn to live in harmony with plants, animals and each other. 

Post Credit: @@xryouthsolidarity

Check out more of @xryouthsolidarity campaign to #DecoloniseConservation

Title: NA
Description:
S.O.S ACRE

🏡Cerca de 120 mil pessoas já foram atingidas pelas enchentes geradas após o transbordamento de rios no Acre, segundo balanço de hoje do Corpo de Bombeiros. 🚒⛑️

Mais de 100 aldeias de diversas etnias indígenas também foram atingidas, precisamos mobilizar pessoas e recursos para ajudar nesta crise.

📰A estimativa atual é que o número de famílias atingidas tenha saltado de ontem (29 mil) para hoje chegando a 32.334. Dessas, 4.400 estão desalojadas e 2.027, desabrigadas.

Uma das situações mais críticas está em Sena Madureira, onde segundo o governo do estado, houve um estrangulamento da estrada, o que —diz o governo— pode gerar uma crise de abastecimento local. A cidade está sem atendimento bancário, já que todas foram atingidas pela enchente.🌧️⛈️

Title: NA
Description:
VERITÀ LIBERA

⛔ Nel 2021, il diritto ad un’informazione seria e trasparente viene sistematicamente ignorato dalla stampa italiana.

⛔ Notizie che meriterebbero la prima pagina vengono limitate a trafiletti riempitivi, se non omesse, mentre gli allarmi di decine di migliaia di scienziati vengono ancora filtrati con il placido ottimismo di chi afferma che la transizione ecologica sia qualcosa di facoltativo, o che in ogni caso si stia già facendo abbastanza per metterla in atto. 

Come può la realtà rovinosa della crisi climatica ed ecologica entrare nel senso comune se i mezzi di comunicazione di massa sembrano più preoccupati di rassicurare che di informare?

Come può un cittadino italiano medio prendere coscienza della propria impronta ecologica e della necessità di cambiamenti strutturali se non sa di essere in pericolo?

Come può chiedere nuove leggi a tutela della vita se non sa che è in corso la Sesta Estinzione di Massa?

E se una volta consapevole lo Stato non ascolta, come può non ribellarsi?

🏭 Sappiamo che una bugia ripetuta abbastanza volte diventa una verità, come il fatto che chiedere che sia fatto il necessario ad evitare il suicidio della nostra civiltà sia qualcosa di “bello” e “nobile”, ma che tuttavia non può prescindere dalla crescita economica infinita.

🏭 Non basta un tocco di verde per potersi definire innocenti, se intanto ci si macchia di sangue firmando ancora assegni miliardari per le compagnie di estrazione di combustibili fossili.

MEDIA, DITE LA VERITÀ*

*Gli scenari sono PIÙ che catastrofici

➡️ +2°C oltre i livelli preindustriali = insicurezza alimentare, disordini sociali, aumento di cataclismi e milioni di sfollati

➡️ +4°C = crollo ecosistemico e rischio concreto di estinzione umana

SIAMO NELLA SESTA ESTINZIONE DI MASSA

RIBELLATI CON NOI

Title: NA
NA
Description:
GLOBAL CALL TO SOLIDARITY WITH NORWEGIAN CLIMATE REBELS 

📅 Thursday, 4th of March 
⏰ 10.00AM (UTC)
📍Norwegian embassies and consulates around the world

On the 4th of March, citizens around the world are protesting against the climate hypocrisy of Norway and the government’s suppression of climate activism. There will be demonstrations at Norwegian embassies and consulates in cities such as Seoul, Rome, Ottawa, Rio de Janeiro, Stockholm and Copenhagen. Join the protest against Norway’s double standard as an oil state that presents itself as a proponent of climate agreements.

The Norwegian Prime Minister, Erna Solberg, proudly boasts that “the person who will shut down Norwegian oil production has not yet been born”. One reason why she says that is that her government is punishing climate activists with fines of up to 20.000 NOK (approximately 2.000 Euros) for civil disobedience.

On the 21st September 2020, 53 Extinction Rebellion Norway activists were arrested for blocking the road in downtown Oslo and for protesting at the Ministry of Oil and Energy. As a result, they received fines which totaled over 100,000 Euros. This stands in stark contrast to the governments’ reaction in Sweden, Denmark, France and Netherlands where there were similar protests at the same time. In these countries, the police broke up the demonstrations without resorting to mass arrests or heavy fines.
The fines levied on the climate activists in Oslo on the 21st of September 2020 were significantly higher than the fines given out to violent protesters in 2019. It is ironic that the country that gave the Nobel Peace Prize to Martin Luther King Jr. in 1964 suppresses civil disobedience with so-called “preventive methods” when it is directed against current Norwegian policies.

Post Credit: @xrnorway 

#ActNow #ClimateEmergency #ExtinctionRebellion #ExtinctionRebellionNorway
#ExtinctionIsForever #OilStateOfNorway #FreeClimateRebels

I've grown up believing that goverments are in place to protect me, but they have continually let us down and I'm scared and tired of waiting for them to take significant action on the climate and ecological crisis."⁣

💚💙🖤❤️🤍⁣

Title: NA
Description:
REBELS LOCKDOWN SCHIPHOL AIRPORT 

Gisterochtend voerden veertig rebellen van Extinction Rebellion (XR) actie op Schiphol! De rebellen wierpen zowel voor als achter de douane blokkades op, lijmden zich vast aan balies, gaven speeches en voerden zelfs een klein theaterstuk op. Zij eisten dat de luchtvaart haar CO2-uitstoot terugbrengt tot netto nul in 2025. 

KLM is als grootste gebruiker van Schiphol voor zo'n vijftien procent in handen van de Nederlandse overheid en heeft anno 2021 nog steeds geen serieus beleid om de CO2-uitstoot terug te dringen. Toch ontvangt het elk jaar 5 miljard staatssteun, een lening die waarschijnlijk nooit wordt terugbetaald. Extinction Rebellion spreekt hier schande van. Hoe kan het zijn dat grootvervuilers zoveel subsidie ontvangen terwijl veel gewone burgers met moeite de eindjes aan elkaar knopen?

Tijdens de actie werden zeven rebellen opgepakt. Gelukkig zijn zij allemaal inmiddels weer vrij. 

Ben jij boos over al die miljarden voor grootvervuilers als KLM? Wil jij dat de overheid nu eindelijk met eerlijk en effectief klimaatbeleid komt? Sluit je aan bij Extinction Rebellion en zet de overheid onder druk. Altijd vreedzaam, maar ook creatief en rebels. Samen zorgen wij voor verandering! Kom naar een informatiebijeenkomst en ontdek wat jij kan doen. 

Links in @extinctionrebellionnl bio. 

Post Credit: @extinctionrebellionnl

Title: NA
Description:
NATURE NEEDS JUSTICE 

Just as the climate movement demands climate justice, justice is needed in nature conservation! In national parks, for example, one sees that without justice in conservation Indigenous people are banished from their lands or even killed. Here it should be noted: 80% of all the world's biodiversity is currently found on the lands of Indigenous peoples, because they generally maintain very regenerative lifestyles that place little stress on ecosystems.

A systemic change in conservation is  needed, with realistic effort to address the high rates of consumption by people in the Global North, and biodiversity loss brought about by industries and the governments that enable them. 

Therefore, @extinctionrebelliondeutschland have launched the #NatureNeedsJustice campaign from the Global North to reflect on our responsibility and how we think and act.

The campaign aims to raise awareness that conservation in the past and today is often linked to racism, and to identify solutions for just conservation that protects human rights and biodiversity at the same time.

📅 February Schedule

Week 1 - 1-5 February:
• 30% by 2030: The “Global Deal For Nature”. Why we need to stop it and what the alternatives are. 

Week 2 - 8-12 February: 
• Tackling the real drivers of biodiversity loss and exploitation- from economic growth and overconsumption to alternative economies and systems change. 

Week 3 - 15-19 February 
• Turning towards an agriculture which supports life - from industrial agriculture to food sovereignty and biodiversity. 

Week 4 - 22-26 February 
• Commodification and financialisation of Nature 

👉🏾 Find Out More - Link in Bio 

#ClimateJustice #IndigenousRights #EnvironmentalJustice #Conservation #Biodiversity #Ecosystem #Regenerative #ClimateEmergency #EcologicalEmergency

Title: NA
Description:
STOP ECOCIDE 

This Monday @xrthehague were at the Peace Palace to bring attention to the fact that ecocide is not recognised  as a crime.

This is perhaps not surprising in a system that is built on the large-scale exploitation of people and ecosystems. But more and more people are becoming aware of the (partially irreversible) damage done - even the Dutch state has recognised the need to act when it signed the Paris Agreement. 

But declarations such as the Paris Agreement are void if they are not followed by action! 

🕵️ Making ecocide a crime would be a first step in giving injured communities the legal means to combat the forces that are still destroying their livelihoods today.

The court case that @milieudefensie won against @shell on behalf of four Nigerian farmers was a hopeful sign. But it took them 13 years and 1.5 million euros to win - an amount that is too damn high! We therefore need clearer legal frameworks so that companies can be more easily held accountable for their dirty business practices! ✊

Post Credit: @xrthehague 
Photo Credit: @josch.khlmn 

#StopEcocide #EcocideLaw #ExtinctionRebellion #TheHague #PeacePalace #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #ClimateJustice

Title: NA
Description:
DEFORESTATION IN SRI LANKA THREATS ELEPHANT POPULATIONS

President @gotabayar signals his intention to degazette the Dahiyagala/Dahaiyagala Wildlife Sanctuary (Tier IV), which also serves a critical Secondary Dual Purpose as a “Wild Elephant Corridor”, linking Udawalawe National Park (Tier II) with the Bogahapelessa National Reserved Forest (Tier Ib), allowing for the movement of wildlife populations out of Udawalawe National Park‼️🗣️

Originally demarcated, declared and gazetted (as per Extraordinary Gazette No. 1239/28), on the 07th of June 2002, the Dahiyagala/Dahaiyagala Wildlife Sanctuary (Tier IV) is a 27 Square Kilometre Protected Area (PA) that is situated in the Moneragala District of the Uva Province. It is nestled amidst Udawalawe National Park (to the south west) and the Bogahapelessa National Reserved Forest (to the north east) and serves a Secondary Dual Purpose as a “Wild Elephant Corridor”, facilitating the continued movement of both Wild Elephants and other terrestrial wildlife populations between the two aforementioned Protected Areas (PAs). 🏞️

This would be catastrophic for Udawalawe’s Wild Elephant Population, a significant percentage of which depends on Dahiyagala/Dahaiyagala’s existence to travel back and forth between the Park and the Bogahapelessa National Reserved Forest (to the north east), in order to reach their feeding grounds and mineral deposits in the Intermediate Zone. 🐘

We now call upon the Cabinet Minister of the Ministry of Wildlife Resources and Forest Conservation (MoWRFC) C.B. Ratnayake, and the Department of Wildlife Conservation (DWC) to prevent the decimation of this Wildlife Sanctuary‼️ 🌏⏳

Post Credit: @xrebellionlk 

#SaveOurForestSL #ActNow #ExtinctionRebellion #Deforestation #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis

Title: NA
Description:
PEACEFUL PROTEST SHOULD NOT BE A CRIME 

This is a letter Konstantin Fokin wrote in prison. Please support him by helping spread the word as he is going to be in a Russian prison for 22 days and is going to go on hunger strike!

This is an extract of what the letter says:

"We have many reasons to protest. The very right to (peaceful) protest is one of them. Very important. Maybe the most important one. Like other rights, it will not fall from the sky, it must be fought for. 

It seemed right to start a hunger strike. Nothing special is needed for this. You can do it almost anywhere. 
I'll try to hold on until the end of the arrest. I'll stop earlier if the following conditions are met:

• All cases initiated by peaceful protesters following 23.01.2021
• Delete article 212.1. from the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation

Peaceful protest should not become an offense or a crime."

#KonstantinFokin #PeacefulProtest #NonViolentDirectAction #NVDA #EXtinctionRebellion #Russia

Title: NA
Description:
❄️Dzisiaj po ulicach krążyła śnieżna ekspedycja w poszukiwaniu zimy. W zeszłym tygodniu wszyscy pospiesznie wygrzebywali/łyśmy z szaf kalesony i sanki, jednak śniegowy szał nie potrwał długo i już dziś nasze sanki szurały po asfalcie. Nasza kilkunastoosobowa grupa wielbicielek/li sportów zimowych robiła rano i popołudniu tzw. swarmingi czyli krótkie blokady ruchu na pasach z banerem. Przez długość trwania jednego zielonego światła dla aut nie pozwalali/łyśmy osobom za kierownicami odjechać, aby lekko wytrącić je z rytmu dnia i zwrócić uwagę na problem. 

☃️W zeszłym tygodniu znalazło się kilku triumfujących negacjonistów klimatycznych, jednak dobrze wiemy, że nie ma się z czego cieszyć. Nadal pamiętamy zimy sprzed kilku lat, kiedy biało było od listopada do lutego. Trudno jest się żegnać ze śniegiem, ale jeszcze trudniej będzie żegnać się z bezpieczeństwem i światem, jaki znamy. Nieodwracalne zmiany już się dzieją, tym dramatyczniejsze w krajach globalnego południa. Niech ten sentyment do bezpowrotnej straty mobilizuje nas do działania. Czas ucieka, nie ma co czekać, aż ktoś u władzy nas uratuje. Same/i musimy się ratować. 

Dołącz do globalnego oddolnego ruchu już dziś! 🌏 ✊

Photo Credit: @karo555666777 & @mikolaj.kiemblowski

Post Credit: @extinctionrebellionwarszawa

Title: NA
Description:
INDONESIA DARURAT KRISIS IKLIM

Menjadi negara tropis dan kepulauan telah membuktikan Indonesia di posisi yang sangat "strategis" untuk terkena dampak krisis iklim. Kenaikan permukaan air laut, punahnya spesies, kekeringan, hingga bencana ekologis seperti banjir akan semakin parah dan semakin sering terjadi. Hal ini jelas akan mengancam kehidupan yang ada, sehingga sudah saatnya Indonesia mendeklarasikan "darurat iklim". 

Beberapa rebels di Kota Malang telah melakukan Banner Strike di pusat kota yaitu Alun-Alun Kota Malang, dengan menyampaikan pesan: "Indonesia Darurat Krisis Iklim".

Bencana akibat krisis iklim sudah semakin marak, dan apabila tetap dibiarkan, semakin buruk dampaknya.

Ayo, kita suarakan bersama tuntutan kita pada para pemangku kebijakan untuk melakukan aksi nyata agar kita semua bisa terbebas dari krisis iklim ini.

Title: NA
Description:
BIODIVERSITY IS THE FOUNDATION OF LIFE

When a single part of biodiversity is lost or degraded, this negatively affects the functioning of the whole system.

Which is why the DECLINE OF BEES populations is very WORRYING.

Bees are VITAL FOR THE SURVIVAL of ecosystems that create food sources for many different species, including us.

If bees disappeared, many of the fruits, vegetables and nuts that we currently enjoy would become scarce or disappear entirely .

Many animals would lose their food source and disappear too.

Our planet is a lot like us. In much the same way that we rely on our hearts, lungs, and muscles to keep us alive and strong, our planet relies on biodiversity to do the same.

In order to do this well, the planet needs a good balance between three different types of diversity: genetic diversity, species diversity, and ecosystem diversity.

Read why on our latest blog (link in bio).

#ExtinctionRebellion #Biodiversity #BiodiversityLoss #ClimateCrisis #EcologicalCrisis #Bees #FoundationOfLife

Title: NA
Description:
🌻📷🎥 Share Photo/Video Message preferably by 23rd Jan (solidarity messages for farmers at Delhi’s border) to scrapfarmacts@gmail.com and

✊ Join the tweet storm this Saturday (23rd January) at 11:30 pm UTC / 5 pm IST. 

🔗 Link in bio with comprehensive toolkit to learn how you can be a part of this action.

Why❓

🌱 Over 1.3 billion Indians depend on the agricultural sector and have dealt with numerous crises for decades. On January 26th, the government will be celebrating the adoption of its Constitution with a military parade, while continuing to perpetuate harmful policies that violate their own Constitution.

🟢 On the other hand over 250 million farmers have been protesting all over, in an effort to convince the union government to repeal the new farm bills. Not only do the laws, which were basically bulldozed through the parliament with no proper deliberation or discussion with the stakeholders, take into consideration any of the farmers' concerns, it also threatens to do away with systems like APMC mandis and the MSP, thereby crippling a group of people already plagued by debt and suicide.   

🌿 At a higher level, given that India’s agrarian culture and varied regional climate have significantly contributed to the global food basket, the laws, exacerbated by the devastating impacts of the climate crisis, will compound global economic insecurity, threaten global food production and overall livability (higher food prices, food security and shortages). 
 
🗺️ These protests impact us all.

🇮🇳 India's farmers and citizens need the global community to pay attention — the world needs to know that India is retreating from a democracy, regressing at an alarming pace and rushing headlong into fascism. International focus on these protests may be the only thing preventing state-sponsored violence and another massacre in India.

📖 Learn more about this and ask you any questions you might have on a zoom call with an ASHA (Alliance for Sustainable & Holistic Agriculture) & Greens with Farmers’ Coalition representative on the 23rd of January.

#farmersprotest #standwithfarmers #india #democracy  #askindiawhy #actnow #tellthetruth #global

Title: NA
Description:
The Washington Climate Assembly the first climate assembly in the USA - has kicked off! 

⏳XR Seattle members, along with other climate activists from around the state, helped organise this effort. 

🗳️ Organised and funded by ordinary people, not the government. There was no pre-existing support in the US for Citizens’ Assemblies; this really is an innovative and trailblazing event for all Americans.

⚖️ Initiated by activists but coordinated independently by a group consisting of representatives from government, academia, and the non-profit community to maintain impartiality. Supported by the Center for Climate Assemblies in Poland (https://climateassemblies.org) on this matter. 

📜 The goal is to create space where people, in a politically divided state (big urban/rural divides), can come together to present solutions to the state legislature.

💪 Organisers said XR's third demand provided a lot of inspiration and momentum for getting this initiated! 

👉🏾 The Washington Climate Assembly is a virtual event convening 80 Washington State residents in January 2021 to learn about, discuss, and recommend climate change solutions for consideration by the State Legislature. Assemblies have been used worldwide to help shape the work of governments, and this virtual event will focus on climate mitigation strategies that equitably support communities disproportionately impacted by climate change. 

👉🏾 Assembly members will be chosen through a lottery to accurately represent the state in terms of demographics such as age, ethnicity, geographic distribution, and political perspectives. 

👉🏾 The event will be live streamed and recorded in January 2021 via Zoom and available for subsequent viewing on the WA Climate Assembly’s website and YouTube channel. 

👉 Visit www.waclimateassembly.org to learn more about the WA Climate Assembly process and livestream date. 
👉 Join the conversation on social media using the hashtag #WAClimateAssembly.

#ExtinctionRebellion
#Beyond Politics
#CitizensAssembly
#WAClimateAssembly

Title: NA
Description:
George Monbiot discusses what the mainstream media covers and what it doesn’t... 

"The reason the massive farmer protests in India are not being covered by the mainstream media is that important stuff does not get covered by the mainstream media. 

Basically if something is fundamental to our survival, it is critically important it will lie outside the circle of light and within the centre of light are trivial issues, the biggest bias in the media is the bias against relevance because if you take on these fundamental and relevant issues then you take on powerful vested interests at the same time, much safer sticking with the trivia, that’s why they don’t take on the climate emergency, it’s why they don’t take on our other deep profound world ranging emergencies. What is important is not salient, what is salient is not important."

Film Credit: Zoe Broughton 

#ExtinctionRebellion #XR #GeorgeMonbiot #MainstreamMedia #ClimateCrisis EcologicalCrisis
